original: kye skyes bu chen po //
analyzed: kye skyes bu chen po //
translated: O great being,🔽Lord of Secrets, in order to benefit and have compassion for those who appear as the afflictions,

original: gsang ba'i bdag po nyon mongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang / snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po nyon mongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang / snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul /
translated: the domain of great beings,

original: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa /
translated: the manifest perfect buddhahood of all phenomena,

original: gang du ma bkag pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa /
analyzed: gang du ma bkag pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa /
translated: the enjoyment of the dharmatā that is not blocked anywhere,

original: thabs kyi theg pa @297b chen po dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par bgro zhing smra ba'i seng+ge khyod kyis phyin ci ma log par bgro ba'i dus la bab po //
analyzed: thabs kyi theg pa @297b chen po dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par bgro zhing smra ba'i seng+ge khyod kyis phyin ci ma log par bgro ba'i dus la bab po //
translated: the supreme intention of the Mahāyāna of methods, the reality that is discussed and spoken of by the lion of speech, the time has come for you to discuss it without error.

original: skyes bu chen po //🔽shin tu rab tu dus la bab po //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po // shin tu rab tu dus la bab po //
translated: O great being,🔽the time has come for you to discuss it very well.

original: nges par dam par bgro ba'i dus la bab po //
analyzed: nges par dam par bgro ba'i dus la bab po //
translated: The time has come for you to discuss it definitively.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skyes bu chen po /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po /
translated: O great being,

original: khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gsang ba chen po'i bdag por dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te /
analyzed: khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gsang ba chen po'i bdag por dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te /
translated: you have been empowered as the lord of the great secret of the speech of all tathāgatas.

original: gang rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang / gang 'thoms pa drang ba'i thabs sprin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag du drang ba'i slad du dgongs pa dam pa'i lus dgrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las /
analyzed: gang rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang / gang 'thoms pa drang ba'i thabs sprin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag du drang ba'i slad du dgongs pa dam pa'i lus dgrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las /
translated: In order to liberate the body of the sublime intention, which is the means of guiding the confused and leading the bewildered, like a net of clouds that easily leads everyone, he was implored, Please liberate the body of the sublime intention.

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the Lord of Secrets said the following:

original: bskul ba'i go cha chen po khyod //
analyzed: bskul ba'i go cha chen po khyod //
translated: You, the great armor of impulsion,

original: kun la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir //
analyzed: kun la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir //
translated: because of your great love for all,

original: gang la bskul bar khyod brtson na //
analyzed: gang la bskul bar khyod brtson na //
translated: in what you are diligent in impulsion,

original: bgro ba gleng bslang legs so legs //
analyzed: bgro ba gleng bslang legs so legs //
translated: the introduction of the discourse is excellent! Excellent!

original: 'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Thus, in this way, at one time

original: nges pa'i don de kho na nyid //
analyzed: nges pa'i don de kho na nyid //
translated: I heard the definitive meaning of thatness

original: thos pa snang ba'i dus gcig na //
analyzed: thos pa snang ba'i dus gcig na //
translated: in the appearance of hearing.

original: thams cad nam mkha' lta bu las //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' lta bu las //
translated: From the sky-like state of all,

original: rang byung rang nyid du thos nas //
analyzed: rang byung rang nyid du thos nas //
translated: I heard the self-originated state itself.

original: gsang ba'i tshig ni 'di skad du //
analyzed: gsang ba'i tshig ni 'di skad du //
translated: The secret words were spoken in this way:

original: thos par gyur pa'i dus gcig na //🔽mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha mthun du //
analyzed: thos par gyur pa'i dus gcig na // mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha mthun du //
translated: At one time, I heard🔽the method of leading by teaching

original: bstan nas drang ba'i thabs su thos //
analyzed: bstan nas drang ba'i thabs su thos //
translated: in accordance with the aspect of the method of engagement.

original: lung gi gtan tshigs 'di skad du //
analyzed: lung gi gtan tshigs 'di skad du //
translated: The logical argument of scripture is as follows:

original: bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na //🔽ldem dgongs sbyor pa'i tshul nyid kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na // ldem dgongs sbyor pa'i tshul nyid kyis //
translated: At one time I heard

original: bstan nas bkri @298a *//
analyzed: bstan nas bkri @298a *//
translated: The teachings through the very method of implied teachings,

original: pa'i thabs su thos //
analyzed: pa'i thabs su thos //
translated: And heard them as a means of guidance.

original: 'dod rkyen tshig ni 'di skad du //
analyzed: 'dod rkyen tshig ni 'di skad du //
translated: The words of the conditions of desire are as follows:

original: rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na //
analyzed: rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na //
translated: At one time, when realization occurred,

original: 'od chen po la 'dod pa ni //
analyzed: 'od chen po la 'dod pa ni //
translated: The desire for great light

original: thabs kyis drang bas nyid du chos //
analyzed: thabs kyis drang bas nyid du chos //
translated: Was the Dharma itself, led by skillful means.

original: gsang sngags rdo rje nam mkha' che //
analyzed: gsang sngags rdo rje nam mkha' che //
translated: Secret mantra, great space of the vajra,

original: tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas //
analyzed: tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas //
translated: Is not an object of verbal experience.

original: brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te //
analyzed: brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te //
translated: It cannot be realized through expression,

original: bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'//🔽dpe 'am tshad ma'am gtan tshigs sam //🔽rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'// dpe 'am tshad ma'am gtan tshigs sam // rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis //
translated: And it is very difficult for me to explain.🔽It cannot be realized through🔽An analogy, a valid cognition, a logical argument,

original: rtogs par nus pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rtogs par nus pa ma yin te //
translated: Or the wisdom of inference.

original: dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra //
analyzed: dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra //
translated: It is like a blind person measuring the sky.

original: 'on kyang bka' yi gnyer gtad cing //
analyzed: 'on kyang bka' yi gnyer gtad cing //
translated: Nevertheless, since I have been entrusted with the teachings🔽And since you have been led by skillful means,

original: log zhen thabs kyis drang ba dang // bskul ba khyod kyi dam tshig kyang //
analyzed: log zhen thabs kyis drang ba dang // bskul ba khyod kyi dam tshig kyang //
translated: And since you have been urged by your sacred pledge,

original: sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus //
analyzed: sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus //
translated: Through the power of donning the armor of the past,

original: ma rtogs pa rnams tshig tsam gyis //🔽mtshon nas rnam grol sa dag la //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa rnams tshig tsam gyis // mtshon nas rnam grol sa dag la //
translated: It is illustrated by mere words,🔽As a means of gradually leading

original: brgyud de drang ba'i thabs nyid du //🔽ci rigs tsam du bgro bar bya //
analyzed: brgyud de drang ba'i thabs nyid du // ci rigs tsam du bgro bar bya //
translated: Them to the stage of liberation.

original: rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa //
translated: The primordial nature of buddhahood

original: mthong dang ma mthong rnam gnyis la //
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong rnam gnyis la //
translated: Is seen in two ways,

original: dman pa'i skabs na de mthong min //
analyzed: dman pa'i skabs na de mthong min //
translated: In the inferior context, it is not seen,

original: mthong ba dam pa'i skabs na 'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dam pa'i skabs na 'o //
translated: But in the context of the sublime, it is.

original: mthong ba mngon thos rnam gnyis la //
analyzed: mthong ba mngon thos rnam gnyis la //
translated: There are two ways of seeing: direct and indirect.

original: mthar phyin dam pa mngon sum pa //
analyzed: mthar phyin dam pa mngon sum pa //
translated: The sublime perfection is direct.

original: blo gros rnal 'byor spyod yon can //
analyzed: blo gros rnal 'byor spyod yon can //
translated: Those with the qualities of mental prowess and yogic practice

original: thos pas mthong bar 'gyur phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pas mthong bar 'gyur phyir ro //
translated: See it through hearing.

original: stug po bkod pa'i rgyal pa yang //
analyzed: stug po bkod pa'i rgyal pa yang //
translated: Even in the Dense Array,

original: chos sku snying por gyur pas na //
analyzed: chos sku snying por gyur pas na //
translated: The dharmakāya is the essence,

original: de yi 'gro ba mi smin phyir //
analyzed: de yi 'gro ba mi smin phyir //
translated: But since beings there are not ripe,🔽The form kāyas are taught.

original: gzugs sku bstan nas @298b chag lam brjod //
analyzed: gzugs sku bstan nas @298b chag lam brjod //
translated: Listen to how the intention

original: 'das pa ma 'ongs da ltar gyi //
analyzed: 'das pa ma 'ongs da ltar gyi //
translated: Of the victorious ones of the past, present, and future🔽Is discussed

original: dpag tu med pa'i dus rnams su //🔽rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa gang //🔽ji ltar rnam par bgros pa nyon //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i dus rnams su //🔽rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa gang //🔽ji ltar rnam par bgros pa nyon //
translated: In immeasurable time.

original: langka'i bdag po 'di lta ste //🔽dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la //
analyzed: langka'i bdag po 'di lta ste // dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la //
translated: O Lord of Lanka, it is like this:🔽If one wishes to enter the intention of the holy ones,

original: 'jug par 'dod na mdzod du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug par 'dod na mdzod du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: one should enter the treasury.

original: rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o //
translated: One should be uncontrived by nature.

original: ljon shing skyes par bya'o //
analyzed: ljon shing skyes par bya'o //
translated: One should be a growing tree.

original: dam par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: dam par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter the holy.

original: sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o //
translated: One should light the lamp.

original: khyad par du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should go to the special.

original: yul la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: yul la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter the object.

original: me long brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: me long brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should examine the mirror.

original: mthun par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: mthun par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should enter in accord.

original: nad gso bar bya'o //
analyzed: nad gso bar bya'o //
translated: One should heal the sickness.🔽It was said:

original: smras pa // gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
analyzed: smras pa // gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
translated: O Lord of Secrets,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi /
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi /
translated: how are those ten enumerations of phenomena to be known?🔽It was said:

original: smras pa / langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / langka'i bdag po /
translated: O Lord of Lanka,

original: chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag las dang po dam pa rnams kyi mdzod du 'jug bar bya na sgo gsum nas zhugs pas gang mi bzad pa'i mdzod du 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag las dang po dam pa rnams kyi mdzod du 'jug bar bya na sgo gsum nas zhugs pas gang mi bzad pa'i mdzod du 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: from among those ten enumerations of phenomena, if one enters the treasury of the holy ones, by entering through the three doors, one enters the treasury of the unbearable.🔽It was said:

original: smras pa / gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
analyzed: smras pa / gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
translated: O Lord of Secrets,

original: sgo gsum gang lags /
analyzed: sgo gsum gang lags /
translated: what are the three doors?

original: smras pa / langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / langka'i bdag po /
translated: He replied, “O Lord of Laṅkā!

original: sgo gsum 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sgo gsum 'di lta ste /
translated: There are three doors:

original: spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo dang / thabs kyi sbyor sgo dang / nges pa'i gsang sgo dang gsum mo //
analyzed: spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo dang / thabs kyi sbyor sgo dang / nges pa'i gsang sgo dang gsum mo //
translated: the door of guidance through conduct, the door of the union of methods, and the door of the definitive secret.”

original: smras pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
analyzed: smras pa / gsang ba ba'i bdag po /
translated: He asked, “O Master of Secrets!

original: sgo de dag gang gis 'byed ba lags //
analyzed: sgo de dag gang gis 'byed ba lags //
translated: By what are those doors opened?”

original: smras pa / langka'i bdag po //
analyzed: smras pa / langka'i bdag po //
translated: He replied, “O Lord of Laṅkā!

original: sgo de dag ni lde mig gsum gyis 'byed par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: sgo de dag ni lde mig gsum gyis 'byed par rig par bya ste /
translated: Those doors should be known to be opened by three keys.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: 'di lta @299a *//
analyzed: 'di lta @299a *//
translated: They are

original: ste; 'byed pa dang / 'grol ba dang / 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: ste; 'byed pa dang / 'grol ba dang / 'byin pa'o //
translated: opening, releasing, and extracting.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: O Lord of Laṅkā!

original: de'ang 'di lta ste /🔽yan lag drug dang mdo bzhi dang // rtsa ba gsum gyi lde mig gis; ;rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mdzod //
analyzed: de'ang 'di lta ste / yan lag drug dang mdo bzhi dang // rtsa ba gsum gyi lde mig gis; ;rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mdzod //
translated: They are as follows:🔽The treasury of the transcendent state of all victors🔽is opened with the key of the six branches, the four summaries,

original: nges par 'byed ces rgyal bas bshad //
analyzed: nges par 'byed ces rgyal bas bshad //
translated: and the three roots.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: O Lord of Laṅkā!

original: de la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo lde mig gsum gyis 'byed pa ni /
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo lde mig gsum gyis 'byed pa ni /
translated: Regarding that, the door of guidance through conduct is opened by three keys.

original: 'di lta ste; yan lag drug dang / mdo bzhi dang / rtsa ba gsum mo //
analyzed: 'di lta ste; yan lag drug dang / mdo bzhi dang / rtsa ba gsum mo //
translated: They are the six branches, the four summaries, and the three roots.

original: de la yan lag drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yan lag drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six branches?

original: rgyu'i yan lag dang / sbyar ba'i yan lag dang / 'bras bu'i yan lag dang / dngos bzhi'i yan lag dang / gzud pa'i yan lag dang / mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go /
analyzed: rgyu'i yan lag dang / sbyar ba'i yan lag dang / 'bras bu'i yan lag dang / dngos bzhi'i yan lag dang / gzud pa'i yan lag dang / mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go /
translated: They are the causal branch, the applied branch, the resultant branch, the branch of the four actualities, the branch of engagement, and the branch of characteristics.

original: de la rgyu'i yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the causal branch?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / smin pa'i yan lag go /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / smin pa'i yan lag go /
translated: the branch of origination and the branch of ripening.

original: langka'i bdag po //
analyzed: langka'i bdag po //
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

original: de la 'byung ba'i yan lag gang zhen /
analyzed: de la 'byung ba'i yan lag gang zhen /
translated: what is the branch of origination?

original: gang yongs su tshogs na brjod pa 'byung ba nyid la bya ste /
analyzed: gang yongs su tshogs na brjod pa 'byung ba nyid la bya ste /
translated: It is that which, when fully assembled, is the origination of expression.

original: tshad ma dang / blo gros dang / 'dzin pa dang / mchod rten dang / 'dus pa dang / nges pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma dang / blo gros dang / 'dzin pa dang / mchod rten dang / 'dus pa dang / nges pa'o //
translated: It is the valid cognition, the intellect, the grasping, the stūpa, the assembly, and the ascertainment.

original: smin pa'i yan lag ni gang dam par smin pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: smin pa'i yan lag ni gang dam par smin pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The branch of ripening is the cause of supreme ripening.

original: gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
translated: What is it? It is as follows:

original: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag go /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag go /
translated: the branch of the factors of awakening and the branch of the path.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag ni yul sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag ni yul sbyor ba ste /
translated: The branch of application is the application to the object.

original: gang blo'i yul la sbyor ba dang / snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gang blo'i yul la sbyor ba dang / snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'o //
translated: It is the application to the object of the mind and the application to the object of compassion.

original: langka'i bdag po //
analyzed: langka'i bdag po //
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de la blo'i yul la sbyor @299b ba ni gang blo gros 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gleng slong ba la sbyor ba dang / blo gros rnyed pa'i rtsa ba sa'i khyad par la sbyor ba dang / blo gros nges pa'i rtsa ba rnam par thar pa la sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: de la blo'i yul la sbyor @299b ba ni gang blo gros 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gleng slong ba la sbyor ba dang / blo gros rnyed pa'i rtsa ba sa'i khyad par la sbyor ba dang / blo gros nges pa'i rtsa ba rnam par thar pa la sbyor ba dang /
translated: among them, the application to the object of the mind is the application to the root of the arising of the mind, which is the introduction; the application to the root of the attainment of the mind, which is the distinctions of the stages; the application to the root of the ascertainment of the mind, which is liberation;

original: blo gros gzhag pa'i rtsa ba de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: blo gros gzhag pa'i rtsa ba de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'o //
translated: and the application to the root of the placement of the mind, which is reality.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'ang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'ang 'di lta ste /
translated: the application to the object of compassion is as follows:

original: gang gi rgyu la sbyor ba dang / 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang / de dag gi rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi rgyu la sbyor ba dang / 'bras bu la sbyor ba dang / de dag gi rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
translated: it is the application to the cause, the application to the result, and the application to their nature.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de la 'bras bu'i yan lag ni gang dang 'brel ba'i dgos ched dam pa 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu'i yan lag ni gang dang 'brel ba'i dgos ched dam pa 'byung ba ste /
translated: among them, the branch of the result is the supreme purpose that arises in connection with it.

original: thob pa dam pa de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: thob pa dam pa de kho na nyid do //
translated: The highest attainment is reality.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

original: de la dngos bzhi'i yan lag ni gang gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba ste /
analyzed: de la dngos bzhi'i yan lag ni gang gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba ste /
translated: the branches of the main part are what comment on the Buddha’s intent.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: gang la chos rnam kyi dngos gzhi gsum du bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: gang la chos rnam kyi dngos gzhi gsum du bsdu ba ste /
translated: The main part of the Dharma is summarized in three topics.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi dang / rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi dang / thams cad kyi dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi dang / rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi dang / thams cad kyi dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The main part of the nature, the main part of the root, and the main part of everything.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

original: de la rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na /
translated: what is the main part of the nature?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: thos pa dang; dong ba dang / gzung ba dang / chub pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang; dong ba dang / gzung ba dang / chub pa'o //
translated: listening, retention, memorization, and understanding.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

original: rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi gang zhe na /

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa la snang ba /

analyzed: @300a *// 'di lta ste / bsdu ba dang / 'jug pa dang / gang zag dang / chos so //

analyzed: phyogs bsdu ba dang; rtogs pa dang / thob par bya ba dang / sbyir phyin pa dang / yongs su bri ba'o //
translated: collection of directions, realization, attainment, thorough understanding, and thorough analysis.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

analyzed: blang ba dang / pham pa dang / ltung ba dang / rang bzhin dang / med pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'byung ba dang / yongs su gtang ba kho nar shes par bya ste /

analyzed: langka'i bdag po /

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: rnam pa ni thams cad du brtags pa ste bden pa dang / gzhag pa dang / nyes pa dang / yon tan dang / tshul dang / 'jug pa dang / rig pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rnam par spros pa'o //
translated: The aspects are all the analyses: the truths, the presentations, the faults, the qualities, the methods, the engagements, the knowledges, the summaries, and the elaborations.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /

analyzed: de la bden pa ni gang zhe na / de kho na nyid gang yin pa'o //

original: gzhag pa ni gang zag dang / brtags pa dang / gcig pa dang / dbye ba dang / dri ba dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / gsang ba dang / bsnyan pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: gzhag pa ni gang zag dang / brtags pa dang / gcig pa dang / dbye ba dang / dri ba dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / gsang ba dang / bsnyan pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / gzhag pa'o //
translated: The presentations are the person, the imputations, the sameness, the divisions, the questions, the presentations, the classifications, the secrets, the whispered, the predictions, and the presentations.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka!

original: yon tan gang zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan gang zhe na /

original: yongs su byang ba'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: yongs su byang ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: They are the synonyms of purification.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka!

analyzed: tshul gang zhe na /

analyzed: don dang / thob pa dang / bshad pa dang / mtha' spong ba dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / dgongs pa'o //

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

analyzed: 'jug pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is engagement?🔽It is time,

original: dus dang / 'dus pa dang / rkyen rnams so //
analyzed: dus dang / 'dus pa dang / rkyen rnams so //
translated: assemblies, and conditions.

original: langka'i bdag po /
analyzed: langka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅkā,

analyzed: rig pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is knowledge?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:🔽dependence,🔽the performance of functions,🔽accomplishment, and

original: ltos pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / chos nyid do //
analyzed: ltos pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / chos nyid do //
