the result, the one who is the transcendent conqueror of the nature of the basis, the one who is the transcendent conqueror of the nature of the path, the one who is the transcendent conqueror

original: chags pa'i rten 'byung ba'i gnas /🔽'gro ba'i lam du gyur pa de dang cha mthun du bstan pa padmo can zhes bya bar grags pa'i zhing khams na /
analyzed: chags pa'i rten 'byung ba'i gnas / 'gro ba'i lam du gyur pa de dang cha mthun du bstan pa padmo can zhes bya bar grags pa'i zhing khams na /
translated: The lotus-like realm is the support for the arising of attachment.🔽It is the path for migrating beings.

original: thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i sku ste gsang ba'i 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba /
analyzed: thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i sku ste gsang ba'i 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba /
translated: In that realm, which is renowned as the Lotus-like realm, the secret body that is not shared in common with others, the inconceivable secret retinue,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows.

original: gsang ba'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje myur ba dang / rdo rje chen po mgyogs pa dang / rdo rje chen po rnon po dang / rdo rje chen po 'byung ba dang / rdo rje chen po 'byed pa dang / rdo rje chen po che ba dang /
analyzed: gsang ba'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje myur ba dang / rdo rje chen po mgyogs pa dang / rdo rje chen po rnon po dang / rdo rje chen po 'byung ba dang / rdo rje chen po 'byed pa dang / rdo rje chen po che ba dang /
translated: The secret great bodhisattvas are the swift vajra, the swift great vajra, the sharp great vajra, the arising great vajra, the separating great vajra, the great great vajra,🔽the vast great vajra, the profound great vajra, the stable great vajra, the various great vajra, and so on.

original: rdo rje chen po yangs pa dang / rdo rje chen po zab pa dang / rdo rje chen po brtan pa dang / rdo rje chen po sna tshogs la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i 'khor 'byung 'jug dang bcas te gang the tshom gcod pa dang /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po yangs pa dang / rdo rje chen po zab pa dang / rdo rje chen po brtan pa dang / rdo rje chen po sna tshogs la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i 'khor 'byung 'jug dang bcas te gang the tshom gcod pa dang /
translated: The secret retinue, together with the arising and entering, abides in the manner of resolving doubts,

original: chod pa dang / zhu bar bsdogs pa'i tshul du bzhugs so //
analyzed: chod pa dang / zhu bar bsdogs pa'i tshul du bzhugs so //
translated: cutting through doubts, and being ready to request.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad re re la 'ang sku'i bye brag 'di ltar snang zhing tha dad du snang ba 'ang med do //
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad re re la 'ang sku'i bye brag 'di ltar snang zhing tha dad du snang ba 'ang med do //
translated: As such, each of the tathāgatas appears with this kind of variety of kāyas, but there is no appearance of difference.

original: gcig dang / tha dad pa'i ngo bo las kyang grol la /
analyzed: gcig dang / tha dad pa'i ngo bo las kyang grol la /
translated: They are also liberated from the nature of one and different.

original: lhan ne lhang nge lham me lhag ger kun nas kun du snang ngo //
analyzed: lhan ne lhang nge lham me lhag ger kun nas kun du snang ngo //
translated: They appear completely, completely clear, bright, radiant, and vivid.

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na mi chen po'i spyod yul thabs kyi theg pa chen po gsang ba'i snying po 'di sku bzhi rnam par snang ba la thos pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don rgyal ba'i sras dag la de kho na nyid ltar bgro ba /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus na mi chen po'i spyod yul thabs kyi theg pa chen po gsang ba'i snying po 'di sku bzhi rnam par snang ba la thos pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don rgyal ba'i sras dag la de kho na nyid ltar bgro ba /
translated: At that time, the field of activity of a great being, this secret essence of the Mahāyāna method vehicle, was heard by the victors’ heirs in the unmistaken meaning of the appearance of the four kāyas, just as it is, in the assembly of the tathāgatas.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos @309a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos @309a *//
translated: All tathāgatas

original: thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so //
analyzed: thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so //
translated: know that all phenomena arise in the sameness of transcendent wisdom and abide in the state called “the sameness of the kāyas, which is free from objectification.”

original: gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so //
analyzed: gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so //
translated: He abides in the state called “the non-apprehension of the equality of speech.”

original: thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am /
translated: He abides in the state called “the non-apprehension of the equality of mind.”🔽He does not apprehend any engagement,

original: ldog pa'am / rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ldog pa'am / rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so //
translated: disengagement, or reversal.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: gnyis ni gang byung brjod pa gnyis nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis ni gang byung brjod pa gnyis nyid do //
translated: the two are the two kinds of expression that occur.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de dag ni rgyu'i yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyu'i yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: these are called the causal factors.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: In the Great Assembly of the Tathāgata’s Intent Sūtra,

original: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: this is chapter forty-seven, the explanation of the perfect introduction.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: rtsa ba'i yan lag gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i yan lag gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: what are the fundamental factors?

original: brjod pa 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gang gis gang gleng bslang ba gang yin pa la bya ste /
analyzed: brjod pa 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gang gis gang gleng bslang ba gang yin pa la bya ste /
translated: They are the root of expression, by which the introduction is made.

original: 'di ltar de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dbyings kyi ngang las mi g-yo bar mnal bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma stong pa nyid kyis ngang las bskul ba chen bo'i sgra 'di 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dbyings kyi ngang las mi g-yo bar mnal bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma stong pa nyid kyis ngang las bskul ba chen bo'i sgra 'di 'byung ngo //
translated: The sound of the invocation was:

original: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
analyzed: yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus //
translated: By the power of the yoga of the emptiness of existence and non-existence,

original: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs //
translated: Come to the pledge from the space-like realm,

original: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //
translated: The expanse of the ocean of wisdom, the sphere of liberation,

original: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs /🔽zhes @309b sgra byung ba las /
analyzed: mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs / zhes @309b sgra byung ba las /
translated: Arising from the realm of space, non-abiding, non-apprehending!

original: bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos thams cad byang chub snying po la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las nyi ma rdo rje byung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos thams cad byang chub snying po la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las nyi ma rdo rje byung ste /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, knowing that all phenomena arise in the essence of enlightenment, arose from the realm of emptiness as the sun-vajra.

original: dper na / nam mkha' dang ba las nyi ma'i snying po shar ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' dang ba las nyi ma'i snying po shar ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the arising of the essence of the sun from the clear sky.

original: de nas nyi ma'i snying po de las 'od zer bye ba mang po bkye bas /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma'i snying po de las 'od zer bye ba mang po bkye bas /
translated: Then from the heart of the sun, many ten millions of light rays were emitted.

original: dper na / nyi ma stong las 'od zer bye ba bkye ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na / nyi ma stong las 'od zer bye ba bkye ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it was like ten million light rays emitted from a thousand suns.🔽From those light rays, clouds of compassion and bodhicitta were fully massed, and a rain of play fell.

original: 'od zer de dag las thugs rje byang chub sems kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te rol ba'i char mngon par bab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kya glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /
analyzed: 'od zer de dag las thugs rje byang chub sems kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te rol ba'i char mngon par bab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs kya glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /
translated: The various plays of thunder, the various plays of lightning, the various plays of offerings, the various plays of songs,

original: rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang / ker go dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi shes rab dang /
analyzed: rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang / ker go dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi shes rab dang /
translated: the various plays of dances, the various plays of drums, conches, cymbals, and flutes, the various plays of ornaments, the various plays of delights, the various plays of wisdom,

original: rol pa sna tshogs kyi ye shes dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi tshor ba dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi btsun mo stong pa chen po de bzhin nyid la rnam par 'jug bar mdzad do //
analyzed: rol pa sna tshogs kyi ye shes dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi tshor ba dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi btsun mo stong pa chen po de bzhin nyid la rnam par 'jug bar mdzad do //
translated: The pristine consciousness of various displays, the samādhi of various displays, the feeling of various displays, the great joy of various displays, and the great queen of emptiness of various displays entered into suchness.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa nyid kyi ngang de las chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi sgra 'di byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa nyid kyi ngang de las chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi sgra 'di byung ngo //
translated: Then, from that state of emptiness, the mother of all tathāgatas, this sound of the dharmatā, suchness, arose:

original: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha //
analyzed: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha //
translated: The deity of the dhātu of the mind of the great accumulation of the two

original: longs spyod @310a *//
analyzed: longs spyod @310a *//
translated: Enjoyment

original: rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku //
analyzed: rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku //
translated: The great display of the body of the great enjoyment

original: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
translated: Vajrasattva, you are the fortune of good fortune.

original: thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs /
analyzed: thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs /
translated: Arise from the dhātu of great bliss through the display of method.

original: zhes sgra des bskul bas bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam par bzhengs te rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rnam par 'khyil ba dang / rnam par 'gying ba dang / rnam par brjid pa dang / gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /🔽rnam par bzhad pa sna tshogs pa dang / thugs rje'i 'phro 'du dang / yon tan gyi khyad par dang / 'od zer gyi 'bar 'phro la sogs pa sprul pa glog gi phremg bas nam mkha' thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de /
analyzed: zhes sgra des bskul bas bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam par bzhengs te rnam par 'phrul ba dang / rnam par 'khyil ba dang / rnam par 'gying ba dang / rnam par brjid pa dang / gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang / rnam par bzhad pa sna tshogs pa dang / thugs rje'i 'phro 'du dang / yon tan gyi khyad par dang / 'od zer gyi 'bar 'phro la sogs pa sprul pa glog gi phremg bas nam mkha' thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de /
translated: One emanates, one coils, one struts, one swaggers, and one performs the great mudra of dance.🔽One laughs in various ways, one emanates and reabsorbs compassion, one has special qualities, one emanates blazing light rays, and so on.🔽Since all of those emanations pervade all of space with a garland of lightning, the nature of secret mantra pervades all aspects, signs, existence, and nonexistence with the state of suchness.

original: thams cad nas thams cad du mtshan ma dang / rnam pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa la gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi ngang gis yongs su khyab ste rang bzhin gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad nas thams cad du mtshan ma dang / rnam pa dang / yod pa dang / med pa la gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi ngang gis yongs su khyab ste rang bzhin gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The nature is clarity itself.

original: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa chen po de kho na nyid las bskul ba tha ma'i sgra 'di byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa chen po de kho na nyid las bskul ba tha ma'i sgra 'di byung ngo //
translated: Then, from the mother of all the tathāgatas, the sound of the final invocation arose from the realm of the great emptiness thatness:

original: ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku //
analyzed: ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku //
translated: The body that plays with illusory wisdom,

original: thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i //
translated: Having gained mastery over great method and wisdom,

original: 'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: 'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: The abode from which many emanations of the noble lord arise,

original: bder gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol /
analyzed: bder gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol /
translated: Sugata, Sugata, arise!

original: zhes bskul bas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchod gi bdag po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge @310b 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: zhes bskul bas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchod gi bdag po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge @310b 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
translated: Thus invoked, the Bhagavān Guhyapati entered the samādhi called the suchness of the vajra play and remained silent.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang las rnam par bskul ba chen po'i sgra byung ba de dag las 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang las rnam par bskul ba chen po'i sgra byung ba de dag las 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur /
translated: Then, from the realm of the perfection of wisdom, the mother of all the tathāgatas, a great sound of invocation arose, and from that, the vast retinue was amazed.

original: rmad du gyur te de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid las glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: rmad du gyur te de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid las glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo //
translated: All of them were amazed, and with one voice they supplicated the Vajra Play with this song:

original: ae ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las //
analyzed: ae ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las //
translated: Amazing! From the supreme wish-fulfilling body, which is like space,

original: khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing //
analyzed: khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing //
translated: The pervasive blessings dance like a vajra,

original: gzi brjid sprin phung rol bas bsgyings pa'i sku //
analyzed: gzi brjid sprin phung rol bas bsgyings pa'i sku //
translated: And the body, majestic with the play of a mass of clouds of splendor,

original: thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
analyzed: thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
translated: Displays the magical display of the unobstructed vajra play.

original: ae ma'o yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las //
analyzed: ae ma'o yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las //
translated: Amazing! From the supreme wish-fulfilling speech, which is like an echo,

original: snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing //
analyzed: snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing //
translated: The blessings of melodiousness are expressed like a vajra,

original: yan lag rgya mtsho mi bzad bkod pa'i gsung //
analyzed: yan lag rgya mtsho mi bzad bkod pa'i gsung //
translated: And the voice, with an array of an ocean of branches,

original: seng+ge yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston //
analyzed: seng+ge yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston //
translated: Displays the magical display of the ocean of secret mantras.

original: ae ma'o ye shes snying po nyi zla lta bu las //
analyzed: ae ma'o ye shes snying po nyi zla lta bu las //
translated: Amazing! From the essence of wisdom, which is like the sun and moon,

original: 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing //
translated: The blazing blessings are blissful like a vajra,

original: thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs //
analyzed: thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs //
translated: And the mind, a bindu free from elaborations and non-conceptual,

original: rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
analyzed: rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston //
translated: Displays the magical display of the truth of liberation.

original: mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams //
translated: The ignorant, confused, and deluded beings who are sinking in the mud,

original: sdug bsngal dra bas bcings pa thabs kyis khrol //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dra bas bcings pa thabs kyis khrol //
translated: Bound by the net of suffering, are freed by skillful means.

original: ma rig mun pas long ba don gyis phye //
analyzed: ma rig mun pas long ba don gyis phye //
translated: Those blinded by the darkness of ignorance are opened up by the meaning.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol //
translated: They are liberated by the boat that crosses the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po //
translated: The great mind of all tathāgatas,

original: ye shes dong yi snying po mchog dang ldan //
analyzed: ye shes dong yi snying po mchog dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the supreme essence of the treasure of wisdom,

original: rnal 'byor theg chen @311a *//
analyzed: rnal 'byor theg chen @311a *//
translated: The yoga of the Mahāyāna,

original: rdo rje kun 'dus lung //
analyzed: rdo rje kun 'dus lung //
translated: The oral transmission of the vajra compendium,

original: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol //
translated: Please explain it in detail to the assembled retinue.

original: aa ho zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: aa ho zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Thus, they supplicated with A ho!

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pas 'khor thams cad la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad pas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pas 'khor thams cad la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad pas /
translated: Then, the Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, Vajra Play, by being supplicated with that song of suchness, looked at the entire retinue and smiled.

original: thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyi mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba 'od zer 'byam klas pa kun nas kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
analyzed: thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyi mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba 'od zer 'byam klas pa kun nas kun tu khyab par mdzad do //
translated: From the expanse of the utterly pure mind, the sun of awareness emits an inconceivable number of light rays that pervade everywhere.

original: 'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srin po lta bu'i gzugs sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srin po lta bu'i gzugs sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
translated: From each of those light rays, various forms emerge, such as vajra yakṣas and vajra rākṣasas.

original: de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa 'khor so so'i zhab ring dang bcas pa zhing khams mtha' yas par khyab cing snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa 'khor so so'i zhab ring dang bcas pa zhing khams mtha' yas par khyab cing snang bar gyur to //
translated: From each of those, an immeasurable number of hundreds of thousands of buddhas, together with their individual retinues, pervade and appear in infinite buddhafields.

original: de las rig pa'i nyi ma'i 'od nam mkha'i khams khyab par byung bas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa thams cad yang dag par bsal lo //
analyzed: de las rig pa'i nyi ma'i 'od nam mkha'i khams khyab par byung bas mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa thams cad yang dag par bsal lo //
translated: Since the light of the sun of awareness arises to pervade the realm of space, all darkness, gloom, and murk are completely dispelled.

original: rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang / chos kyi char dang / chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang / chos kyi gar sna tshogs dang / chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung ste 'byam klas pa'i nam mkha' la phan tshun dang / yan man dang /
analyzed: rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang / chos kyi char dang / chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang / chos kyi gar sna tshogs dang / chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung ste 'byam klas pa'i nam mkha' la phan tshun dang / yan man dang /
translated: The sound of the Dharma, the rain of the Dharma, the various songs of the Dharma, the various dances of the Dharma, and the various offerings of the Dharma arose, pervading the sky in all directions, above and below,

original: snrel zhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long phyad par byung ngo //
analyzed: snrel zhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long phyad par byung ngo //
translated: and in all the intermediate directions, appearing in a state of confusion.

original: rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od @311b  par dbar 'phro 'khrug cing ling long phyad do //
analyzed: rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od @311b  par dbar 'phro 'khrug cing ling long phyad do //
translated: The marvelous inconceivable kāya shone with light, appearing in a state of confusion.

original: rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o //🔽rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang aa ho zhes sgrogs so //
analyzed: rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o // rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang aa ho zhes sgrogs so //
translated: The marvelous mind was clear.🔽The marvelous inconceivable speech proclaimed “aho!”

original: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'ang gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu ae ma'o rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrogs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'ang gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu ae ma'o rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrogs //
translated: Inconceivable buddhas proclaimed in one voice the sound of the inconceivable Dharma, “Ema! The marvelous Dharma has arisen!”

original: 'khor 'bum phrag dang / gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed /
analyzed: 'khor 'bum phrag dang / gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed /
translated: He was surrounded by a hundred thousand retinues and various disciples, and he generated the marvelous joy of emanation.

original: rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs /
analyzed: rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs /
translated: He trained in the strength of knowledge.

original: don gyi che ba phyung /
analyzed: don gyi che ba phyung /
translated: He expanded the great meaning.

original: ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so //🔽zhi bar gnas so //
analyzed: ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so // zhi bar gnas so //
translated: All of them remained in awe and amazement.🔽They remained in peace.

original: dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so //
analyzed: dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so //
translated: They remained in joy.

original: de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shangs kyi h'um rings las rdo rje mngon pa'i mthu can 'di dag mngon par byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shangs kyi h'um rings las rdo rje mngon pa'i mthu can 'di dag mngon par byung ngo //
translated: Then, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, having entered into the concentration called the vajra continuum of purifying the retinue, the vajra with the power of manifestation emerged from the hūṃ in his nose.🔽Hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

original: h'um h'um h'um rdo rje 'dus par 'dus pa yi //
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um rdo rje 'dus par 'dus pa yi //
translated: The assembly of vajras,

original: theg chen dam pa'i rigs can rnams //
analyzed: theg chen dam pa'i rigs can rnams //
translated: the ones of the sacred family of the Great Vehicle,

original: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
translated: according to the sequence of upper and lower,

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de //
translated: arrayed in the ranks of the vajra secret,

original: rigs ma yin pa rigs med 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs ma yin pa rigs med 'gyur //
translated: the non-families become without family.

original: rigs can rnams kyi dam tshig ni //
analyzed: rigs can rnams kyi dam tshig ni //
translated: The sacred pledge of the families

original: rigs med rnams la 'bab mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs med rnams la 'bab mi 'gyur //
translated: does not descend upon the non-families.

original: de las 'das na de rlag byed //🔽h'um kro dha dzva la sa ma ya /🔽raksha shka dzra la sa ma ya /
analyzed: de las 'das na de rlag byed // h'um kro dha dzva la sa ma ya / raksha shka dzra la sa ma ya /
translated: If you transgress this, you will be destroyed.🔽Hum krodha jvala samaya!🔽Raksha shakra jvala samaya!

original: yaksha dzva las ma ya /
analyzed: yaksha dzva las ma ya /
translated: Yaksha jvala samaya!

original: tsitta dzva la sa ma ya /🔽zhes sgra phyung bas zhal ljags kyi dbang po'i 'od phung las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang / srin po 'od kyi @312a *//
analyzed: tsitta dzva la sa ma ya / zhes sgra phyung bas zhal ljags kyi dbang po'i 'od phung las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang / srin po 'od kyi @312a *//
translated: Citta jvala samaya!🔽As these sounds were uttered, from the light-mass of the tongue of the face, there arose a garland of blazing light of wrathful ones, a garland of light of rakshasas, a garland of light of yakshas, and a garland of light of flesh-eaters.

original: phreng ba 'phro ba dang / gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang / za byed 'od kyi phreng ba tshub ma brgyud mar 'byung bas ru tra dang / bdud dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'jug sred dang / sred med dang /
analyzed: phreng ba 'phro ba dang / gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang / za byed 'od kyi phreng ba tshub ma brgyud mar 'byung bas ru tra dang / bdud dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'jug sred dang / sred med dang /
translated: The series of these light garlands arose in succession, and Rudra, Mara, rakshasas, yakshas, Kama, Narayana,

original: dbang phyug dang / stobs ldan dang / spre'u dang / ra dang / lu 'de dang / sbrang ma dang / bya rog dang / me khyer dang / 'khor ba dang / chu dang / sa dang / nam mkha' dang / me dang / sgra dang /
analyzed: dbang phyug dang / stobs ldan dang / spre'u dang / ra dang / lu 'de dang / sbrang ma dang / bya rog dang / me khyer dang / 'khor ba dang / chu dang / sa dang / nam mkha' dang / me dang / sgra dang /
translated: Mahesvara, Balada, monkeys, goats, pigeons, bees, crows, fireflies, samsara, water, earth, space, fire, sound,

original: rtog spyod la sogs pa mtshan mar mi gnas chos nyid du zhi bar gyur to //
analyzed: rtog spyod la sogs pa mtshan mar mi gnas chos nyid du zhi bar gyur to //
translated: The conceptual activities and so forth were pacified in the dharmatā, without abiding in characteristics.

original: de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang / 'khor mang po de dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang / 'khor mang po de dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa /
translated: Then, those light rays gathered in the sky, and the many retinues were terrified and made a request:

original: ae ma'o // ae ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis snod du rung bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
analyzed: ae ma'o // ae ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis snod du rung bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
translated: “Ema! Ema! Bless us, Bhagavān, to be suitable vessels.

original: theg pa chen po'i rigs su gzung du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i rigs su gzung du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las /
translated: Uphold us in the Mahāyāna family.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs phyung bas 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil ba dang / mdzes shing bde bas thams cad rangs par byas nas snod rnam par sbyangs te 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs phyung bas 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil ba dang / mdzes shing bde bas thams cad rangs par byas nas snod rnam par sbyangs te 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to //
translated: When they made this request, the Bhagavān emitted a radiance from his face, and those light rays gathered into the light of wisdom, and the beautiful and blissful [light] satisfied everyone, purifying the vessels, and dissolved into the abode of light.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: O King of Laṇkā,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi gnas ba'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi gnas ba'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa /
translated: Then the bhagavān, the lord of the supreme secret, having definitely arisen from the dimension of the great wisdom of nonabiding, with a sound like the victorious lion, spoke this sound of the great scripture of the vajra dance of the gathering of all intentions:🔽the arrangement of the meaning,

original: rtags kyi rol pa /
analyzed: rtags kyi rol pa /
translated: the play of the sign,

original: @312b gsang pa'i nges pa /
analyzed: @312b gsang pa'i nges pa /
translated: the secret certainty,

original: bka'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: bka'i 'grel pa /
translated: the commentary of the command,

original: chos kyi me long /
analyzed: chos kyi me long /
translated: the mirror of the Dharma,

original: gtan tshigs kyi 'byung gnas /🔽dgongs pa kun 'dus rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po'i sgra 'di byung ngo //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi 'byung gnas / dgongs pa kun 'dus rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po'i sgra 'di byung ngo //
translated: the source of the reasoning,🔽and the gathering of all intentions.

original: aom h'um mum zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung /
analyzed: aom h'um mum zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung /
translated: He spoke oṃ hūṃ muṃ and then remained silent.

original: rab tu mi gsung /
analyzed: rab tu mi gsung /
translated: He did not speak at all.

original: gsungs pa mi 'gog /
analyzed: gsungs pa mi 'gog /
translated: He did not stop speaking.

original: 'gog pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gog pa ma yin /
translated: He was not silent.

original: ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so //
analyzed: ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so //
translated: While not speaking, he remained in the essence of the extensive explanation.

original: lang ka'i bdag po; de dag ni rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o //
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po; de dag ni rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o //
translated: “O lord of Laṇkā, those are called the root applications.”

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: From the Great Assembly of the Unification of the Transcendent Enlightenments of All Buddhas,

original: rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o;; ;;lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o;; ;;lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: THE LIMB OF CONNECTION

original: de la 'brel ba'i yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'brel ba'i yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of connection?

original: gang dang / gang dag tu 'brel ba ste de ni 'di ltar ched du 'gro ba ched du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dang / gang dag tu 'brel ba ste de ni 'di ltar ched du 'gro ba ched du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of connection is the connection between this and that, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.🔽Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the view?🔽Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the view is the view of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the object?🔽Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the object is the object of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.🔽Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the cause?🔽Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the cause is the cause of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.🔽Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the result?🔽Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the result is the result of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.

original: de nas bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' gyur pa la /
analyzed: de nas bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' gyur pa la /
translated: Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the path?🔽Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the path is the path of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathāgata himself.🔽Then, again, the Lord of Lanka said to Mañjuśrı̄, Mañjuśrı̄, what is the limb of the foundation?

original: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des theg pa chen po gsang ba'i don bdag nyid kyis rgya cher ched du brjod cig bar dgongs pa'i phyir bdag la nyi tsher zhal 'dud pas gzigs te 'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des theg pa chen po gsang ba'i don bdag nyid kyis rgya cher ched du brjod cig bar dgongs pa'i phyir bdag la nyi tsher zhal 'dud pas gzigs te 'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do //
translated: Mañjuśrı̄ said, The limb of the foundation is the foundation of the mind, which should be understood in detail by the Tathā

original: de nas bdag dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bar snang ba des yang dag par bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs te rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas @313a *//
analyzed: de nas bdag dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bar snang ba des yang dag par bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs te rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas @313a *//
translated: Then, the one who appears as the Great Vow Vajrasattva, having understood that he was truly urged, rose from his seat and touched his insignia to the five places.

original: nas theg pa chen po de kho na nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i ched du lce padma'i steng du bzhag ste shin tu gus pas lus kyi bag bzhis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas te
analyzed: nas theg pa chen po de kho na nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i ched du lce padma'i steng du bzhag ste shin tu gus pas lus kyi bag bzhis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas te
translated: In order to explain the reality of the Great Vehicle, he placed his tongue on the lotus and, with great respect, bowed down with his four limbs. Having made prostrations in the yogic style, he looked at the Teacher with the gaze of a lion

original: 'di skad du gsol to //
analyzed: 'di skad du gsol to //
translated: and made this request:

original: rdo rje rgyal po tshogs bdag dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po tshogs bdag dgongs su gsol //
translated: Vajra King, Lord of the Assembly, please consider this!

original: chos kyi rgyal po mi g-yo rgyal tshul mdzad //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po mi g-yo rgyal tshul mdzad //
translated: Dharma King, acting in the manner of the Immutable Victor,

original: rgyal mchog bde chen sa la rab bzhugs te //
analyzed: rgyal mchog bde chen sa la rab bzhugs te //
translated: Supreme Victor, abiding on the ground of great bliss,

original: smra ba'i las mchog rdo rje lce 'bar bas //
analyzed: smra ba'i las mchog rdo rje lce 'bar bas //
translated: with the blazing vajra tongue, the supreme activity of speech,

original: sgra dbyangs rgyal po rnams kyis bdag byin rlobs //
analyzed: sgra dbyangs rgyal po rnams kyis bdag byin rlobs //
translated: may the King of Melodious Sounds bless me!

original: gsang sngags rgyal po chos kyi me long 'di //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po chos kyi me long 'di //
translated: This king of secret mantra, the Mirror of Dharma,

original: rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po nyid kyi mthus //
analyzed: rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po nyid kyi mthus //
translated: By the power of the supreme king of Dharma himself,

original: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher brjod par 'os //🔽aa ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las; gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdag rdo rje las kyi bka' bar bsgo ba de rdo rje brjod pa chen por byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par🔽zhugs nas ljags kyi 'od zer las badzra karma satva tsakra ha ha ham/
analyzed: 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher brjod par 'os // aa ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las; gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdag rdo rje las kyi bka' bar bsgo ba de rdo rje brjod pa chen por byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ljags kyi 'od zer las badzra karma satva tsakra ha ha ham/
translated: Is worthy to be extensively expressed to the assembly.🔽When he made this request, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, in order to bless the vajra speech of Vajrakarma, entered the samadhi called Vajra Radiance,🔽and from the light rays of his tongue, the mantra Vajra Karma Satva Chakra Ha Ha Hum

original: rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo 'bar ba sems dpa' rdo rje kho na bdag de'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo 'bar ba sems dpa' rdo rje kho na bdag de'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob ste /
translated: appeared as a blazing vajra cross wheel, which fell into the hand of the being Vajra, and he attained the empowerment of the vajra of action.

original: rnam par smra ba chen po shin tu bla bkyal ba'i spobs pa can du byin gyis brlabs nas kun tu mi gzo ba rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen @313b bar gyur to //
analyzed: rnam par smra ba chen po shin tu bla bkyal ba'i spobs pa can du byin gyis brlabs nas kun tu mi gzo ba rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen @313b bar gyur to //
translated: Having blessed the great speaker with the power of a very clever mind, he became extremely careful about not being ungrateful.

original: de nas bdag sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag tu blangs nas rdo rje tshig sna tshogs kyis lan lnga ste /
analyzed: de nas bdag sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag tu blangs nas rdo rje tshig sna tshogs kyis lan lnga ste /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva Vajra took that sign of activity in his hand and turned it twelve times with various vajra words.

original: rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas grangs gnyis dang lngar bsgyur bas zhing khams mtha' rnam par dag par g-yos te /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas grangs gnyis dang lngar bsgyur bas zhing khams mtha' rnam par dag par g-yos te /
translated: By transforming the number two into five, the buddha field was shaken in all directions.

original: g-yos / rab tu g-yos /
analyzed: g-yos / rab tu g-yos /
translated: It shook, shook strongly,

original: kun tu rab tu g-yos /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu g-yos /
translated: and shook everywhere strongly.

original: 'gul / rab tu 'gul /
analyzed: 'gul / rab tu 'gul /
translated: It trembled, trembled strongly,

original: kun tu rab tu 'gul /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'gul /
translated: and trembled everywhere strongly.

original: ldeg rab tu ldeg /
analyzed: ldeg rab tu ldeg /
translated: It quaked, quaked strongly,

original: kun tu rab tu ldeg /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu ldeg /
translated: and quaked everywhere strongly.

original: 'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs /
analyzed: 'khrugs / rab tu 'khrugs /
translated: It was disturbed, disturbed strongly,

original: kun tu rab tu 'khrugs /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'khrugs /
translated: and disturbed everywhere strongly.

original: 'ur / rab tu 'ur /🔽kun tu rab tu 'ur /
analyzed: 'ur / rab tu 'ur / kun tu rab tu 'ur /
translated: It roared, roared strongly,🔽and roared everywhere strongly.

original: kun tu chem /
analyzed: kun tu chem /
translated: It quivered everywhere.

original: rab tu chem /🔽kun tu rab tu chem; mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/
analyzed: rab tu chem / kun tu rab tu chem; mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/
translated: It quivered strongly,🔽and quivered everywhere strongly.🔽The edges were high and the center was low,

original: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/
analyzed: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/
translated: and the center was high and the edges were low.

original: shar mthon ni nub dma'/🔽nub mtho na ni shar dma'/
analyzed: shar mthon ni nub dma'/ nub mtho na ni shar dma'/
translated: The east is high, the west low.🔽The west is high, the east low.🔽The south is high, the north low.

original: lho mthon ni byang dma'/
analyzed: lho mthon ni byang dma'/
translated: The north is high, the south low.

original: byang mthon ni lho dma' bar gyur te zhing khams thams cad bdag rdo rje sems dpa' sha dag lta bur gyur nas gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher brjod pa'i sgra rnam par brjod do //
analyzed: byang mthon ni lho dma' bar gyur te zhing khams thams cad bdag rdo rje sems dpa' sha dag lta bur gyur nas gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher brjod pa'i sgra rnam par brjod do //
translated: All the buddha fields become like me, Vajrasattva.

original: bdag sems dpa' rdo rje nyid rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshon pa'i khri la 'gying bag gi tshul gyi rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: bdag sems dpa' rdo rje nyid rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshon pa'i khri la 'gying bag gi tshul gyi rnam par gnas so //
translated: I, the being Vajra, in a wrathful manner, remain in a proud posture on a lion throne marked with a vajra in front of the Teacher.

original: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs 'khor phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs 'khor phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the majority of the assembly of retinues said this to the Bhagavān:

original: ae ma'o bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ae ma'o bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Ema! Bhagavān!

original: sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni @314a *//🔽'di ltar mthu che ba /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni @314a *// 'di ltar mthu che ba /
translated: This being Vajra🔽is like this, of great power,

original: 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs che ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs che ba /
translated: like this, of great blessing,

original: 'di ltar rgya che ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgya che ba /
translated: like this, vast,

original: 'di ltar mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar mkhas pa /
translated: like this, wise,

original: 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang 'brel cing thugs las skyes pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang 'brel cing thugs las skyes pa /
translated: In this way, the profound and the luminous are connected with the mind of the Bhagavat and are born from the mind.

original: de kho na nyid dang 'brel cing de kho na nyid las skyes pa lags so zhes gsol pas kho bo la bstod pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang 'brel cing de kho na nyid las skyes pa lags so zhes gsol pas kho bo la bstod pa dang / lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Since he said this, he praised me, and then, Lord of Lanka,

original: bcom ldan 'das des de dag la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des de dag la bka' stsal pa /
translated: the Bhagavat said to them,

original: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs /
translated: Great assembly,

original: sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo /
translated: this Bodhisattva Vajra is the essence of the mind of enlightenment,

original: snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po /
analyzed: snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po /
translated: the lord of all compassion,

original: thabs thams cad kyi mchog /
analyzed: thabs thams cad kyi mchog /
translated: the supreme of all methods,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rje btsun /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rje btsun /
translated: the lord of the buddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yab /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yab /
translated: the father of all bodhisattvas,

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi rnal 'byor /
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi rnal 'byor /
translated: the yoga of all yogas,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa kun gyi ded dpon /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa kun gyi ded dpon /
translated: the captain of all nirvanas,

original: bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po //
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po //
translated: the great demon of all demons,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang gdul dka' 'dul ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang gdul dka' 'dul ba /
translated: the tamer of the difficult to tame of all buddhas,

original: chos thams cad kyi mdzod /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mdzod /
translated: the treasury of all dharmas,

original: gsang ba thams cad kyi bdag po /
analyzed: gsang ba thams cad kyi bdag po /
translated: the lord of all secrets,🔽and the great hero of all heroes.

original: ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is the great source of all wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: thog ma dang / tha ma med par mnyam pa'i dus pha mtha' las kyang pha mtha' dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa 'byam klas pa'i dus na /
analyzed: thog ma dang / tha ma med par mnyam pa'i dus pha mtha' las kyang pha mtha' dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa 'byam klas pa'i dus na /
translated: In the past, in the beginningless and endless present, in the limitless and inconceivable future,

original: bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa; mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te /
analyzed: bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa; mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te /
translated: he has already accomplished his work and completed his task.

original: de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor @314b zhing chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'brel bas rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thugs dang 'brel ba /
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor @314b zhing chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'brel bas rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thugs dang 'brel ba /
translated: He is the one who is connected with the nature of all phenomena, who is connected with the nature of all phenomena, who is born from the mind of all the victors, who is connected with the mind of all the victors,

original: thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te /
translated: and who is the father of all.

original: de 'dra'o zhes kho bo la bsngags pa brjod pa bka' stsal ba las /
analyzed: de 'dra'o zhes kho bo la bsngags pa brjod pa bka' stsal ba las /
translated: He is the one who is praised by me as ‘such.’

original: 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te /
translated: When he spoke these words, the entire retinue of the assembly was amazed.

original: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: They said, ‘Bhagavān,

original: de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: this is amazing!

original: bde par gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde par gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so zhes gsol te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so zhes gsol te /
translated: It is like this: it is truly wondrous.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de la logs su btud nas lus kyi bag bzhis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas nas rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de la logs su btud nas lus kyi bag bzhis la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas nas rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te /
translated: Having bowed to the sublime being Vajra, he prostrated with his four limbs touching the ground in the yogic style and made various offerings of marvelous flowers and samādhi.

original: 'di ltar rmad 'byung ngo mtshar khyod //
analyzed: 'di ltar rmad 'byung ngo mtshar khyod //
translated: He then made this request: Wondrous and marvelous!🔽 Born from the mind of the Buddha,

original: sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa; ;ji ltar zhing 'dir snang zhig gu /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa; ;ji ltar zhing 'dir snang zhig gu /
translated: how do you appear in this realm?

original: rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras //
translated: Yoga father, son of the Victorious Ones,

original: rang bzhin kun dang gcig 'brel ba'i //
analyzed: rang bzhin kun dang gcig 'brel ba'i //
translated: connected with all natures,

original: bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas //
analyzed: bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas //
translated: turn the wheel of the teachings

original: rnam dag lam mchog dam pa dag /
analyzed: rnam dag lam mchog dam pa dag /
translated: and illuminate the supreme, pure path

original: tshig gis mtshon te gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: tshig gis mtshon te gsal bar mdzod //
translated: with words that illustrate it.

original: aa ho zhes gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: aa ho zhes gsol ba btab bo //
translated: He made this request, saying A ho!

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṅka,

original: de nas dam pa rdo rje bdag gis rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid bag tu rdo rje tshig tu smras pa /
analyzed: de nas dam pa rdo rje bdag gis rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid bag tu rdo rje tshig tu smras pa /
translated: then the sublime being Vajra, having turned and transformed the vajra, spoke with majestic vajra words:

original: aom h'um mum aa ho /
analyzed: aom h'um mum aa ho /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ muṃ a ho.

original: rgyal ba'i sras bo cang mi gsung //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras bo cang mi gsung //
translated: The Victor’s son remained silent.

original: mi gsung bas nas rgya cher bshad //
analyzed: mi gsung bas nas rgya cher bshad //
translated: By remaining silent, he explained extensively.

original: bshad du med pa'i chos nyid 'di //🔽rgyal ba rnams kyis @315a *//
analyzed: bshad du med pa'i chos nyid 'di // rgyal ba rnams kyis @315a *//
translated: This inexpressible reality

original: ma bshad de //
analyzed: ma bshad de //
translated: was not explained by the victors.

original: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //
analyzed: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //
translated: Thus, the teacher, the supreme victor,

original: rnam par bshad par mi bzhed de //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par mi bzhed de //
translated: also did not wish to explain.

original: rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o //
translated: He intended to explain extensively.

original: skye ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i chos nyid ni //
translated: The reality of non-arising

original: ma skyes pas na snying por bshad //
analyzed: ma skyes pas na snying por bshad //
translated: is unborn, and therefore explained as the essence.

original: snying po don de gang yin pa //
analyzed: snying po don de gang yin pa //
translated: The meaning of the essence

original: tshig tu smra bar yod ma yin //
analyzed: tshig tu smra bar yod ma yin //
translated: cannot be expressed in words.

original: spros pa nyid na gol ba zhes //
analyzed: spros pa nyid na gol ba zhes //
translated: Elaboration itself is called “deviating,”

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi yang dag bshad //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi yang dag bshad //
translated: truly explained by the victors.

original: de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid //
translated: Therefore, the Vajra King

original: bka' ma stsal bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' ma stsal bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: intended not to speak.

original: dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa //
analyzed: dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa //
translated: The meanings of the intentions that are brought forth

original: ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar //🔽dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa //
analyzed: ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar // dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa //
translated: are like reflections in a mirror.🔽The meaning of the intentions appear to

original: ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na //
analyzed: ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na //
translated: the one who knows the meaning of the unborn essence.

original: tshig tu spros pa ma yin na'ang //
analyzed: tshig tu spros pa ma yin na'ang //
translated: Although it is not elaborated in words,

original: mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogin of symbolic words

original: tshig la zhib la don la rtsing //
analyzed: tshig la zhib la don la rtsing //
translated: Is detailed in words but concise in meaning.

original: tshig phyir blo 'brel rtsal zhan rnams //
analyzed: tshig phyir blo 'brel rtsal zhan rnams //
translated: Those with weak faculties who are connected to words

original: bkri bas bsam pa rangs bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bkri bas bsam pa rangs bya'i phyir //
translated: Are satisfied by being led.

original: mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi //
translated: From the non-apprehensible, the apprehensible

original: cho 'phrul tshig gis de mtshon dgos //
analyzed: cho 'phrul tshig gis de mtshon dgos //
translated: Must be indicated by the symbolic words.🔽The heart of the secret

original: bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs //
analyzed: bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs //
translated: Of all the Sugatas and Victorious Ones

original: gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don //
analyzed: gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don //
translated: Is the meaning of the essence of reality.

original: mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po //
analyzed: mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po //
translated: The equality of enlightenment is the Great Vehicle.

original: gsal bar kun la khyab snang ba'i //
analyzed: gsal bar kun la khyab snang ba'i //
translated: The appearance that pervades all

original: kun gyis de nyid mthong bya dgos //🔽nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
analyzed: kun gyis de nyid mthong bya dgos // nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
translated: Must be seen by everyone.🔽I am the essence of all the

original: rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste //
translated: Victorious Ones dwelling in the three times.

original: stong bar sbas pa'i don 'di la //
analyzed: stong bar sbas pa'i don 'di la //
translated: In this meaning that is hidden in emptiness,

original: brda dang dpes mtshon lde mig gis //
analyzed: brda dang dpes mtshon lde mig gis //
translated: With the key of symbolic indication

original: mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye 'o //
analyzed: mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye 'o //
translated: The door of awareness of equality is opened.

original: sbas pa'i don @315b mtshon 'byung ba'i rigs //
analyzed: sbas pa'i don @315b mtshon 'byung ba'i rigs //
translated: The secret meaning is indicated

original: ma mthong rnams la bstan par bshad //
analyzed: ma mthong rnams la bstan par bshad //
translated: And explained to those who have not seen it.

original: de mthong de bzhin nyid du 'thad //
analyzed: de mthong de bzhin nyid du 'thad //
translated: Seeing that, it is tenable just as it is.

original: ces gsang ba ba'i bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs 'brel yan lag bzhir 'dus par go cha bsgos so //
analyzed: ces gsang ba ba'i bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs 'brel yan lag bzhir 'dus par go cha bsgos so //
translated: Thus, the Lord of Secrets was clad in the armor of understanding all phenomena to be included in the four branches of the treatise.

original: de nas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas chos thams cad yongs su chub par gyur to //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: de nas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas chos thams cad yongs su chub par gyur to // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: Then, the spiritual warriors of lesser bodies, such as the lord of Laṇkā, also became completely fulfilled with respect to all phenomena through the four branches of the treatise.

original: 'brel pa dgos ched kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu /
analyzed: 'brel pa dgos ched kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu /
translated: This was the fortieth chapter, on the branch of the treatise that explains the connection and purpose, from this great king of tantras called “The Tantra of the Great River of the Inconceivable Secrets of Āṇḍāla.”

original: rtsa dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: rtsa dgu pa'o ////
translated: CHAPTER XLIX

original: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa /
analyzed: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa /
translated: Then, the Lord of Secrets addressed the lord of Laṇkā:

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: “Lord of Laṇkā,

original: de la 'dren pa'i yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dren pa'i yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: what are the branches of guidance?

original: gang las gang du yongs su 'dren pa ste de'ang 'di ltar bgro ba rnam par yongs su bgro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang las gang du yongs su 'dren pa ste de'ang 'di ltar bgro ba rnam par yongs su bgro bar bya'o //
translated: It is that which guides from one place to another, and that should be discussed in the following way.”

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Laṇkā,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is as follows.

original: yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag ni //
analyzed: yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag ni //
translated: The branch of complete guidance

original: bcu phrag gcig gis 'dren pas ni //
analyzed: bcu phrag gcig gis 'dren pas ni //
translated: is the tenfold.

original: smra brjod tshig gi yan lag rdzogs //
analyzed: smra brjod tshig gi yan lag rdzogs //
translated: The branch of verbal expression is complete.🔽The words of the view, the opening of the door,🔽the gathering, the leading to prosperity,

original: gang la lta dang sgo 'byed dang // sdud dang 'byor par 'dren pa dang // rkyen dang gzhan dmigs 'dzin ba'i tshig /🔽ma bcos me long snrel zhi rnams //
analyzed: gang la lta dang sgo 'byed dang // sdud dang 'byor par 'dren pa dang // rkyen dang gzhan dmigs 'dzin ba'i tshig / ma bcos me long snrel zhi rnams //
translated: the condition, the observation of another, and the grasping🔽are the ten mirrors.

original: me long bcu dang mthun sbyar bas //
analyzed: me long bcu dang mthun sbyar bas //
translated: In accordance with the ten mirrors,

original: tshig don rnam par sbyar ba yin //
analyzed: tshig don rnam par sbyar ba yin //
translated: the words and meanings are applied.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: gang la lta dang lta ba ni /
analyzed: gang la lta dang lta ba ni /
translated: The view and the one who views🔽are the view and the one who views here.

original: @316a *// gang 'dir mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
analyzed: @316a *// gang 'dir mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
translated: The one who goes in the sky

original: rtsal gyis nam 'phangs rlabs su gcod //
analyzed: rtsal gyis nam 'phangs rlabs su gcod //
translated: cuts off the range of the view with the range of strength.

original: de bzhin de nyid 'dir 'gro ba //
analyzed: de bzhin de nyid 'dir 'gro ba //
translated: In the same way, the one who goes here

original: ma 'dres lta 'phangs rlabs su gcod //
analyzed: ma 'dres lta 'phangs rlabs su gcod //

original: bgrod par bya ba'i sa tshigs dag /
analyzed: bgrod par bya ba'i sa tshigs dag /

original: rtsal tshad dag gi tshad du gcod //
analyzed: rtsal tshad dag gi tshad du gcod //
translated: are cut off with the measure of strength.

original: de bzhin don dang tshig mtshams dag /
analyzed: de bzhin don dang tshig mtshams dag /
translated: In the same way, the words and meanings

original: don gyi tshigs dang tshoms su gcod //
analyzed: don gyi tshigs dang tshoms su gcod //
translated: are cut off with the measure of meaning.

original: ji ltar gang gi khobs 'og tu //
analyzed: ji ltar gang gi khobs 'og tu //
translated: Just as the range below

original: sa khams mang po chud pa ltar //
analyzed: sa khams mang po chud pa ltar //

original: brjod pa'i rnam grangs mang po kun //
analyzed: brjod pa'i rnam grangs mang po kun //
translated: All the many enumerations of expression

original: gang gi ngo bo gcig tu sdud //
analyzed: gang gi ngo bo gcig tu sdud //

original: gang dang gang ltar 'gro ba dag /
analyzed: gang dang gang ltar 'gro ba dag /

original: drang por 'brel rjes gnon par snang //
analyzed: drang por 'brel rjes gnon par snang //
translated: They appear to be pressing on the path that connects them.

original: brjod dang brjod pa'i tshig mtshams dag /
analyzed: brjod dang brjod pa'i tshig mtshams dag /
translated: The words of expression and the intervals between

original: gang 'dir mi 'khrug 'brel bar sbyor //
analyzed: gang 'dir mi 'khrug 'brel bar sbyor //

original: gang 'gro gnas su bgrod pa ni //
analyzed: gang 'gro gnas su bgrod pa ni //
translated: Wherever one goes, wherever one stays,

original: g-yo 'gul mi mngon shugs kyis 'gro /🔽yi ge brjod dang rang gnyer gyis //
analyzed: g-yo 'gul mi mngon shugs kyis 'gro / yi ge brjod dang rang gnyer gyis //
translated: One goes by force without apparent movement.🔽The essence of whatever is connected in that way

original: gang gi ngo bo de bzhin sbyor //
analyzed: gang gi ngo bo de bzhin sbyor //

original: gang zhig gang ltar gang 'gro ba //
analyzed: gang zhig gang ltar gang 'gro ba //
translated: Wherever and however whatever goes,

original: mi 'tsham pa la der 'tsham snang //
analyzed: mi 'tsham pa la der 'tsham snang //
translated: It appears suitable in the unsuitable.

original: brlang po zher 'debs skyon tshig  rnams //
analyzed: brlang po zher 'debs skyon tshig  rnams //
translated: All harsh, offensive, and faulty words

original: gang mi 'tsham pa der 'tsham sbyor //
analyzed: gang mi 'tsham pa der 'tsham sbyor //
translated: Are connected to the suitable in the unsuitable.

original: gang dag yid la btags pa'i zas //
analyzed: gang dag yid la btags pa'i zas //

original: khor nas 'dod pa'i bcud 'byin byed //
analyzed: khor nas 'dod pa'i bcud 'byin byed //

original: gang du dmigs su 'dzin pa yis //
analyzed: gang du dmigs su 'dzin pa yis //
translated: Whatever is grasped as an object

original: gang mi gsal bar mngon par ston //
analyzed: gang mi gsal bar mngon par ston //

original: ji ltar sgra brnyan rgyan byung na //
analyzed: ji ltar sgra brnyan rgyan byung na //
translated: Just as when an echo occurs,

original: gang skye'i dus su yid ches 'gyur //
analyzed: gang skye'i dus su yid ches 'gyur //
translated: one is convinced that it has arisen from somewhere.

original: de bzhin tshad ma'i yul byung na //
analyzed: de bzhin tshad ma'i yul byung na //
translated: In the same way, when the domain of valid cognition occurs,

analyzed: ma bcos de nyid yin par nges // gang @316b 'dir  dag pa'i me long gis //
translated: one is certain that it is the uncontrived nature itself.🔽Just as a pure mirror

original: bzhin dang gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar //
analyzed: bzhin dang gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar //
translated: shows one’s face and one’s reflection,

original: nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis //
translated: the mirror of illustration

original: gang mi mthong pa ltar //
analyzed: gang mi mthong pa ltar //
translated: shows what is not seen.

original: nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis //
translated: The mirror of illustration

original: gang mi mthong ba snel mtshams 'phen sdud 'chol mtshams sbyor //
analyzed: gang mi mthong ba snel mtshams 'phen sdud 'chol mtshams sbyor //
translated: shows what is not seen.

original: rtsal chen rol pa'i stobs chen ltar //
analyzed: rtsal chen rol pa'i stobs chen ltar //
translated: Like the great power of the display of great strength,

original: de nyid rig pa nyid du sbyor //
analyzed: de nyid rig pa nyid du sbyor //
translated: it is applied to the awareness of thatness itself.

original: lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni //
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni //
translated: Lord of Lanka, these🔽are to be understood as merely branches

original: gang smra brjod du 'dren pa yi //🔽yan lag kho nar shes par gyis //
analyzed: gang smra brjod du 'dren pa yi //🔽yan lag kho nar shes par gyis //
translated: that lead to the conveyance of speech.

original: zhes gsang ba ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams thams cad la gang du smra ba'i sgo yongs su 'byed par gyur to //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: zhes gsang ba ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams thams cad la gang du smra ba'i sgo yongs su 'byed par gyur to // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: Thus did the Lord of Secrets speak, and the great spiritual heroes, headed by the ruler of Lanka, opened wide the door of speech to all.

original: yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag rnam par bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o ////🔽de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po de la nges par bos te rnam par smras pa /🔽lang ka'i bdag po; 'di lta ste /🔽gang du nges pa'i yan lag ni //🔽gang la gang gis gang brjod pa //
analyzed: yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag rnam par bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o //// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po de la nges par bos te rnam par smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po; 'di lta ste / gang du nges pa'i yan lag ni // gang la gang gis gang brjod pa //
translated: This was the fiftieth chapter, “The Analysis of the Branches of Definitive Expression,” from The Great Collection Scripture of the Enlightened Attributes of All Buddhas.🔽THE FOUR BRANCHES OF THE TEACHING

analyzed: 'brel bzhi bshad sbyor brjod pa'i sgo //

original: yongs su dag pa lhang nge ba'i //
analyzed: yongs su dag pa lhang nge ba'i //
translated: THE BRANCH OF THE GROUND🔽THE BRANCH OF THE PATH🔽THE BRANCH OF THE RESULT

original: gang la spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
analyzed: gang la spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
translated: THE BRANCH OF THE BASIS🔽THE BRANCH OF THE GROUND🔽THE BRANCH OF THE PATH

original: mtha' thug med pa'i 'gro gang dag /
analyzed: mtha' thug med pa'i 'gro gang dag /
translated: THE BRANCH OF THE RESULT🔽THE BRANCH OF THE BASIS

original: 'di na snod bzhi kho nar gzigs //
analyzed: 'di na snod bzhi kho nar gzigs //
translated: THE BRANCH OF THE GROUND🔽THE BRANCH OF THE PATH🔽THE BRANCH OF THE RESULT

original: zhen chags can dang log sred can //
analyzed: zhen chags can dang log sred can //
translated: Those with attachment and those with wrong desires,

original: rigs rgyud can dang blo gros can //
analyzed: rigs rgyud can dang blo gros can //
translated: Those with lineage and those with intelligence,🔽All appear in four parts.

original: thams @317a *// cad cha bzhir snang ba ste //🔽'dod khrid sbyor dang nges par snang //
analyzed: thams @317a *// cad cha bzhir snang ba ste // 'dod khrid sbyor dang nges par snang //

original: de dag res 'ga' cha bzhi ste //
analyzed: de dag res 'ga' cha bzhi ste //
translated: And sometimes in four parts,

original: gang du dgongs pa gang nges pa //
analyzed: gang du dgongs pa gang nges pa //

original: ngo bo dmigs dang bcas ba las //
analyzed: ngo bo dmigs dang bcas ba las //
translated: From the nature with reference points,

original: bka' don gtan tshigs rig pa bzhir //
analyzed: bka' don gtan tshigs rig pa bzhir //

original: snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar //
analyzed: snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar //
translated: Are applied to appearances, non-contradiction, expansion, and feasibility.

original: thams cad med rgyu brtags chags pa //
analyzed: thams cad med rgyu brtags chags pa //
translated: All are examined for the cause of non-existence,🔽And are accomplished as established, appearing as seen.

original: bsgrubs 'grub ji ltar bltas par snang; ;gang dag gang la brda phrad pas //
analyzed: bsgrubs 'grub ji ltar bltas par snang; ;gang dag gang la brda phrad pas //
translated: By those who understand the symbols,

original: gang gi don len nyid du nges /
analyzed: gang gi don len nyid du nges /
translated: It is ascertained as the meaning to be taken.

original: zhes nges pa dam pa nyid du bgros pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad brda tsam gyis gang gi nges pa rnyed par gyur to //
analyzed: zhes nges pa dam pa nyid du bgros pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad brda tsam gyis gang gi nges pa rnyed par gyur to //
translated: Thus, by discussing the highest certainty, the inferior bodhisattvas of the body attained certainty in all phenomena as mere symbols.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: From The Great Heap of Jewels: The Compendium of Intentions of All Tathāgatas,

original: nges pa dam pa'i yan lag bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
analyzed: nges pa dam pa'i yan lag bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
translated: This is the fifty-first chapter, the “Chapter on the Discussion of the Definitive Meaning.”

original: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po la yid yongs su 'jug pa'i thabs kyis bos te smras pa /🔽lang ka'i bdag po yan lag gi /
analyzed: de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po la yid yongs su 'jug pa'i thabs kyis bos te smras pa / lang ka'i bdag po yan lag gi /
translated: Then the Lord of Secrets, with a method of engaging the mind, addressed the great spiritual warrior, the lowliest of men, the lord of Lanka:

original: mthar zad rtogs 'jug thabs nyid ni //
analyzed: mthar zad rtogs 'jug thabs nyid ni //
translated: “Lord of Lanka, the method of engaging the realization of the exhaustion of the branches

analyzed: rang bzhin 'byung sgo dbang sbyor dang // nges pa khong du chud pa yis //
translated: is by means of the nature, the door of arising, the application of power, and

original: yang dag don la nges gzhag bya //
analyzed: yang dag don la nges gzhag bya //
translated: the ascertainment of the meaning of reality.

original: shes dang 'jug dang 'bras bu dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin //🔽de 'brel de dgos de mtshon dgos //
analyzed: shes dang 'jug dang 'bras bu dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin // de 'brel de dgos de mtshon dgos //
translated: The characteristics of the wisdom, the engagement, the result, and the spontaneous are

original: de yi rjes su byed dgos yin //
analyzed: de yi rjes su byed dgos yin //
translated: the connection, the necessity, the indication, and the necessity of following.

original: @317b thos chung dgoms dang nges par gyur //
analyzed: @317b thos chung dgoms dang nges par gyur //

original: phye mthong zhugs dang thob pa yin //
analyzed: phye mthong zhugs dang thob pa yin //

original: de tshol de rnyed 'jug mngon gyur //
analyzed: de tshol de rnyed 'jug mngon gyur //

original: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub dang 'grub //
analyzed: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub dang 'grub //

analyzed: de bzhin mnyam 'gyur rnal 'byor par // lhun grub las su rung ba 'o //

original: de ni nges par 'jug rim yin //
analyzed: de ni nges par 'jug rim yin //

original: gzhan gyi don du 'byung rim bzhin //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du 'byung rim bzhin //

original: g-yo dang cho 'phrul snang mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo dang cho 'phrul snang mdzad pa'o //

original: ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar ba yin //
analyzed: ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar ba yin //

original: de shes de ma skyes par shes //
analyzed: de shes de ma skyes par shes //
translated: Knowing that, one knows it is not a thing of time,🔽And knowing that, one knows it primordially.

original: de dus dngos med shes pa dang // ye nas shes pa'i rim bzhin no //
analyzed: de dus dngos med shes pa dang // ye nas shes pa'i rim bzhin no //

analyzed: thams cad mnyam nyid de nyid dang // bsgrub dang mi 'da' spyod mthun rdzas //

analyzed: rang bzhin rnam pa lngar snang ba'o //

analyzed: gang mkhas che dang mang yas yangs //

analyzed: bsgyur dang rlabs chen cir ston dang // kun shong kun spyod bder 'jug pa'o //

analyzed: bcom dang zhi dang mtha' rgyas dang // chub par 'dus pa las bzhi'o //
translated: Accomplishment, not transgressing, consistent conduct, and substance.🔽The five aspects of the nature are:

original: gang du sbyor ba'i yan lag 'dis //
analyzed: gang du sbyor ba'i yan lag 'dis //
translated: The suchness of the equality of everything,🔽Accomplishment, not transgressing, consistent conduct, and substance.🔽The five aspects of the nature are:

original: yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa yin //
translated: The suchness of the equality of everything,🔽Accomplishment, not transgressing, consistent conduct, and substance.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: The five aspects of the nature are:🔽The suchness of the equality of everything,🔽Accomplishment, not transgress

original: de dag ni yan lag yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni yan lag yin te /
translated: These are the branches.

original: yan lag des gang ltar brjod pa thams cad rnam par 'byed par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag des gang ltar brjod pa thams cad rnam par 'byed par shes par bya'o //
