analyzed: de skad ces gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad khong du chud par gyur to //
translated: When the Lord of Secrets said this, the bodhisattvas of lesser bodies understood all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /🔽'jug pa thabs kyi yan @318a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las / 'jug pa thabs kyi yan @318a *//
translated: From The Great Heap of Jewels Discourse

original: lag las thabs rnam par 'grel ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
analyzed: lag las thabs rnam par 'grel ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
translated: The Chapter on the Explanation of Methods, from the Fifty-Second Chapter on the Branches of the Method of Engagement

original: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa /
analyzed: de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa /
translated: Then again the Lord of Lanka asked the Lord of Secrets:

original: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
translated: “Kye! Lord of Secrets!

original: mdo yongs su dgrol ba zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags //
analyzed: mdo yongs su dgrol ba zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags //
translated: What is the ‘unravelling of the discourses’ like?”

original: de skad ces dris pa las /
analyzed: de skad ces dris pa las /
translated: When this was asked,

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: the Lord of Secrets said:

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: “Lord of Lanka!

original: mdo 'di ni 'di ltar gang du gang ltar brjod pa thams cad mdo bzhi po 'di dag kho nar zad do //
analyzed: mdo 'di ni 'di ltar gang du gang ltar brjod pa thams cad mdo bzhi po 'di dag kho nar zad do //
translated: This discourse is such that all the statements made anywhere are included in just these four discourses.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: what are the four?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis mthong bas nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis mngon sum par 'byung ba dang / gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis mthong bas nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis mngon sum par 'byung ba dang / gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa'o //
translated: the definite emergence through hearing, the definite emergence through seeing, the definite emergence through direct realization, and the definite emergence from nowhere whatsoever.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de la gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: de la gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba ni /
translated: among them, the definite emergence through hearing is as follows:

original: kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid //
translated: The suchness that is the nature of all

original: gang gis thos pa de nyid du //
analyzed: gang gis thos pa de nyid du //
translated: is heard as it is.

original: dngos po med par kun khyab rgyas //
analyzed: dngos po med par kun khyab rgyas //
translated: It pervades all things as nonthings.

original: de shes de bzhin nyid du chub; ;lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: de shes de bzhin nyid du chub; ;lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: gang gis mthong ba nges par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: gang gis mthong ba nges par 'byung ba ni /
translated: the definite emergence through seeing is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gang gis de bzhin de mthong na //
analyzed: gang gis de bzhin de mthong na //
translated: When that suchness is seen,

original: mthong bas snang srid yongs su dag /
analyzed: mthong bas snang srid yongs su dag /
translated: through seeing, the world of appearances and possibilities is totally purified.

original: gang la'ang nyam nga yod ma yin //
analyzed: gang la'ang nyam nga yod ma yin //
translated: There is no fear whatsoever.

original: de bzhin nyid der kun sangs rgyas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid der kun sangs rgyas //
translated: In that suchness, all are buddhas.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: gang gis mngon sum par nges par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: gang gis mngon sum par nges par 'byung ba ni /
translated: the definite emergence through direct realization is as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gang gis stong nyid de shes pa //
analyzed: gang gis stong nyid de shes pa //
translated: Whoever knows that emptiness

original: der @318b ni thams cad mngon sum du //
analyzed: der @318b ni thams cad mngon sum du //
translated: Everything is directly perceived.

original: stong pa nyid du nges par zad //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du nges par zad //
translated: It is certain that everything is exhausted in emptiness.

original: de nyid mngon sum sangs rgyas yin //
analyzed: de nyid mngon sum sangs rgyas yin //
translated: That itself is the direct perception of buddhahood.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa ni /
analyzed: gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa ni /
translated: There is no definite emergence from anywhere.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽thams cad de bzhin nyid dbyings su //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / thams cad de bzhin nyid dbyings su //
translated: It is like this:

original: ye nas rnam rtog med sangs rgyas //
analyzed: ye nas rnam rtog med sangs rgyas //
translated: Everything is primordially awakened in the space of suchness.

original: gdong sangs rgyas su ga la yod //
analyzed: gdong sangs rgyas su ga la yod //
translated: How can there be buddhahood?

original: de bzhin de nyid kho na 'o //
analyzed: de bzhin de nyid kho na 'o //
translated: It is just that suchness itself.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /🔽de dag ni mdo sde gang gis gang la gang ltar brjod pa mtha' yas ba mdo bzhi po de dag 'ba' zhig kho nar zad do //
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po / de dag ni mdo sde gang gis gang la gang ltar brjod pa mtha' yas ba mdo bzhi po de dag 'ba' zhig kho nar zad do //
translated: Lord of Lanka,🔽Those are the four sutras that express the limitless teachings in the sutras.

original: de dag ni gang gi mdud pa rnam par 'grol ba ste chos thams cad rnam par grol cing rgya cher 'grel ba nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gang gi mdud pa rnam par 'grol ba ste chos thams cad rnam par grol cing rgya cher 'grel ba nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: Those are the unknottings of the sutras, which should be understood as the complete and extensive commentaries on the liberation of all phenomena.

original: gsang ba ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad gsal bar yongs su chub par gyur to //
analyzed: gsang ba ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad gsal bar yongs su chub par gyur to //
translated: The Lord of Secrets having said this, the bodhisattvas of lesser bodies became fully aware of all directions being illuminated.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /🔽mdo rgya cher 'grel pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o ////🔽de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rtsa ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las / mdo rgya cher 'grel pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o //// de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rtsa ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa /
translated: The Lord of Secrets having said this, the bodhisattvas of lesser bodies became completely clear in all directions.

original: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /🔽gang gi rtsa ba ni gang /🔽nges par 'byin pa ni gang /🔽gsang ba pa'i bdag po /🔽go dbye bar gsol /🔽smra ba'i seng+ge /🔽shin tu go dbye bar gsol /
analyzed: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po / gang gi rtsa ba ni gang / nges par 'byin pa ni gang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po / go dbye bar gsol / smra ba'i seng+ge / shin tu go dbye bar gsol /
translated: This was the fifty-third chapter in “The Great Tantra of the Pristine

original: de skad ces smras pa las /🔽@319a *// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /🔽lang ka'i bdag po /🔽gang gi rtsa ba dri ba de ni legs so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa las /🔽@319a *// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /🔽lang ka'i bdag po /🔽gang gi rtsa ba dri ba de ni legs so //
translated: Consciousness of the Tathāgatas.

original: shin tu rab tu legs so //
analyzed: shin tu rab tu legs so //
translated: Very good, very good!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: rtsa ba ni me long dang / mi mthun pa dang / nges pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba ni me long dang / mi mthun pa dang / nges pa'o //
translated: The root is the mirror, the discordant, and the ascertainment.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: me long ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar gang gis nges pa'ang de ltar lta'o //
analyzed: me long ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba ste nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar gang gis nges pa'ang de ltar lta'o //
translated: the mirror is like this: the example of the concordant quality of space is taken up. Just as space is, so is ascertainment.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de la nam mkha' gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' gang zhe na /
translated: what is space?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: rang bzhin gcig pa dang / mi gos pa dang / go 'byed pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / dbyibs med pa dang / kha dog med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa dang / mi gos pa dang / go 'byed pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / dbyibs med pa dang / kha dog med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang /
translated: the single nature, the unstained, the opening, the non-arising, the non-ceasing, the shapeless, the colorless, the unconditioned, the ungraspable,

original: 'dzin pa med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / dbus med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med ba dang / g-yo ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa dang /
analyzed: 'dzin pa med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / dbus med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med ba dang / g-yo ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa dang /
translated: the ungrasped, the boundless, the centerless, the non-increasing, the non-decreasing, the non-going, the non-coming, the unmoving, the unvibrating,

original: chags pa med pa dang / gnas ba med ba dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / stong pa med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / ma khyab pa med pa dang / mi 'byung ba med pa dang / ma chub pa med pa dang /
analyzed: chags pa med pa dang / gnas ba med ba dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / stong pa med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / ma khyab pa med pa dang / mi 'byung ba med pa dang / ma chub pa med pa dang /
translated: It is without attachment, without abiding, without destruction, without emptiness, without change, without non-pervasiveness, without non-arising, without non-realization,

original: skye ba med pa dang / nub pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa dang / nub pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / 'bras bu med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yin no //
translated: without birth, without setting, without characteristics, without causes, without conditions, without results, without effort, and without manifest activity.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: nam @319b mkha' ni yod pa las med par gyur pa ma yin /
analyzed: nam @319b mkha' ni yod pa las med par gyur pa ma yin /
translated: space does not become non-existent from existence,

original: med pa las yod par gyur pa ma yin /
analyzed: med pa las yod par gyur pa ma yin /
translated: nor does it become existent from non-existence.

original: de bzhin du gsal ba las mi gsal bar gyur pa dang / mi gsal ba las gsal bar gyur pa dang / tha dad pa las gcig tu gyur pa dang / gcig pa las tha dad du gyur pa dang / yin pa las min par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gsal ba las mi gsal bar gyur pa dang / mi gsal ba las gsal bar gyur pa dang / tha dad pa las gcig tu gyur pa dang / gcig pa las tha dad du gyur pa dang / yin pa las min par gyur pa dang /
translated: Similarly, it does not become unclear from clarity, nor does it become clear from unclarity, nor does it become one from being different, nor does it become different from being one, nor does it become non-existent from existence,

original: min pa las yin par gyur pa dang / nye bar las ring bar gyur pa dang / ring ba las nye bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin du che ba dang / chung bar gyur pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: min pa las yin par gyur pa dang / nye bar las ring bar gyur pa dang / ring ba las nye bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin du che ba dang / chung bar gyur pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan par gyur pa dang /
translated: from not being to being, from being near to being far, from being far to being near, and likewise from being great to being small, from being good to being bad,

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / khyab pa dang / ma khyab par gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung bar gyur pa dang / dag pa dang / ma dag par gyur pa dang / grub pa dang / ma grub par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / khyab pa dang / ma khyab par gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung bar gyur pa dang / dag pa dang / ma dag par gyur pa dang / grub pa dang / ma grub par gyur pa dang /
translated: from being happy to being suffering, from being pervasive to being nonpervasive, from being an element to being a nonelement, from being pure to being impure, from being established to being unestablished,

original: mtho ba dang / dma' bar gyur pa dang / yangs pa dang / dog par gyur pa dang / dbyibs dang / dbyibs med par gyur pa dang / kha dog dang / kha dog med par gyur ba dang / phyi dang / nang du gyur pa dang /
analyzed: mtho ba dang / dma' bar gyur pa dang / yangs pa dang / dog par gyur pa dang / dbyibs dang / dbyibs med par gyur pa dang / kha dog dang / kha dog med par gyur ba dang / phyi dang / nang du gyur pa dang /
translated: from being high to being low, from being vast to being narrow, from being a shape to being shapeless, from being a color to being colorless, from being external to being internal,🔽and from being internal to being external.

original: skye ba dang / 'gag par gyur pa dang / 'pho ba dang / mi 'pho bar gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / mi 'gyur bar gyur pa dang / mun pa dang / snang bar gyur pa dang / sngon dang / phyi mar gyur pa dang /
analyzed: skye ba dang / 'gag par gyur pa dang / 'pho ba dang / mi 'pho bar gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / mi 'gyur bar gyur pa dang / mun pa dang / snang bar gyur pa dang / sngon dang / phyi mar gyur pa dang /
translated: It is not born, does not cease, does not pass away, does not not pass away, does not change, does not not change, is not light, is not dark, is not past, is not future,

original: mtha' dang / dbus su gyur pa dang / bdag dang / gzhan du gyur pa dang / de bzhin du blangs nas dor bar gyur pa @320a *//
analyzed: mtha' dang / dbus su gyur pa dang / bdag dang / gzhan du gyur pa dang / de bzhin du blangs nas dor bar gyur pa @320a *//
translated: is not an end, is not a middle, is not a self, is not other, and likewise, it is not taken up and then cast aside.🔽It is not taken up and then cast aside.

original: dang / dor ba las blangs bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' ni thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'o //
analyzed: dang / dor ba las blangs bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' ni thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'o //
translated: Therefore, space is unfabricated in every way.

original: de bzhin du 'di nyid kyang sbyar te de'i phyir ma bcos pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di nyid kyang sbyar te de'i phyir ma bcos pa'o //
translated: The same applies here, and therefore it is unfabricated.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas /
translated: Space is not created by anyone.

original: byed pa po med /🔽rgyu las ma byung /
analyzed: byed pa po med / rgyu las ma byung /
translated: It has no creator.🔽It does not arise from causes.

original: rkyen las ma bskyed /
analyzed: rkyen las ma bskyed /
translated: It is not produced by conditions.

original: dang por ma skyes /
analyzed: dang por ma skyes /
translated: It is not born in the beginning.

original: tha mar mi 'jig /
analyzed: tha mar mi 'jig /
translated: It does not perish in the end.

original: thog ma dang / tha mar mi dmigs /
analyzed: thog ma dang / tha mar mi dmigs /
translated: It is not observed as a beginning or an end.

original: thob pa dang / ma thob pa med /
analyzed: thob pa dang / ma thob pa med /
translated: There is no attainment and no nonattainment.

original: re ba dang / brtsal ba med do //
analyzed: re ba dang / brtsal ba med do //
translated: There is no hope and no search.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas /
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas /
translated: Therefore, space is not created by anyone.

original: byas pa med pas gnyen po med do //
analyzed: byas pa med pas gnyen po med do //
translated: Since it is not created, it has no antidote.

original: de bzhin du de nyid kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pas gnyen po med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du de nyid kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pas gnyen po med do //
translated: In the same way, since reality is not created because it is not created by an agent, it has no antidote.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:🔽One who seeks the end of space

original: gang zhig nam mkha'i mtha' tshol ba; ;tshol bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: gang zhig nam mkha'i mtha' tshol ba; ;tshol bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te //
translated: will not find it through seeking.

original: sgo skabs yod par gang shes pa //
analyzed: sgo skabs yod par gang shes pa //
translated: One who knows that space is an opening

original: de ni nam mkha' rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' rnyed pa'o //
translated: has found space.

original: sems kyi sems nyid rtsad gcod pa //
analyzed: sems kyi sems nyid rtsad gcod pa //
translated: One who investigates the mind itself

original: rtsa ba med pas rnyed ma yin //
analyzed: rtsa ba med pas rnyed ma yin //
translated: will not find it because it has no root.

original: gzhi rtsa med 'byung gang shes pa //
analyzed: gzhi rtsa med 'byung gang shes pa //
translated: One who knows that it arises without basis or root

original: de ni sems nyid rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sems nyid rnyed pa'o //
translated: has found the mind itself.

original: sems kyis sems btsal sems mi rnyed //
analyzed: sems kyis sems btsal sems mi rnyed //
translated: The mind does not find the mind when it searches for the mind.

original: su zhig sems kyi gting rtsa tshol //
analyzed: su zhig sems kyi gting rtsa tshol //
translated: Who seeks the depths of the mind?

original: gang zhig sems kyi dbus mtha' 'byed //
analyzed: gang zhig sems kyi dbus mtha' 'byed //
translated: Who distinguishes the center and end of the mind?

original: btsal bas rnyed pa ga la yin //
analyzed: btsal bas rnyed pa ga la yin //
translated: How can it be found through searching?

original: sems kyis sems la ji ltar mtshon //
analyzed: sems kyis sems la ji ltar mtshon //
translated: How can the mind be indicated by the mind?

original: sems la dngos bo yod ce 'am //
analyzed: sems la dngos bo yod ce 'am //
translated: If the mind has an entity,

original: sems kyi dngos po gang gis bya //
analyzed: sems kyi dngos po gang gis bya //
translated: By what entity of mind is it made?

original: dngos med dngos @320b sprul byang chub sems //
analyzed: dngos med dngos @320b sprul byang chub sems //
translated: The non-entity is the emanation of the mind of enlightenment.

original: phyogs bral chen po gang su zhig /
analyzed: phyogs bral chen po gang su zhig /
translated: Who is the great one free from extremes?

original: phyogs gcig bral bas phyogs kun bral //
analyzed: phyogs gcig bral bas phyogs kun bral //
translated: By being free from one extreme, all extremes are free.

original: brtags pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa //
analyzed: brtags pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa //
translated: It is beyond the sphere of investigation.

original: de nyid rtogs na de kho na //
analyzed: de nyid rtogs na de kho na //
translated: If it is realized, it is that itself.

original: sems kyis sems btsal drod cig rnyed //
analyzed: sems kyis sems btsal drod cig rnyed //
translated: The mind finds heat by searching for the mind.

original: drod de rnyed na byang chub sems //
analyzed: drod de rnyed na byang chub sems //
translated: If that heat is found, it is the mind of enlightenment.

original: ci yang yin no gang yang rung //
analyzed: ci yang yin no gang yang rung //
translated: It is anything at all, anything whatsoever.

original: de nyid chos kyi don po mchog /
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi don po mchog /
translated: That itself is the supreme meaning of the Dharma.

original: des na 'khor ba'i chos nyid 'di //
analyzed: des na 'khor ba'i chos nyid 'di //
translated: Therefore, the dharmatā of samsara

original: gnyis su yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: gnyis su yod pa ma yin te //
translated: Does not exist as a duality.

original: 'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni //
translated: The suchness of samsara

original: chos nyid yin par lung du bstan //
analyzed: chos nyid yin par lung du bstan //
translated: Is taught in the scriptures as dharmatā.🔽The illusion of delusion in samsara

original: 'khor bar 'khrul pa'i sgyu ma dang // rnam dag rnam byang sgyu ma gnyis //
analyzed: 'khor bar 'khrul pa'i sgyu ma dang // rnam dag rnam byang sgyu ma gnyis //
translated: And the illusion of pure purification

original: sems can sangs rgyas tha dad kyang //
analyzed: sems can sangs rgyas tha dad kyang //
translated: Are different for sentient beings and buddhas,

original: de bzhin nyid las yod ye med //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las yod ye med //
translated: But they have never existed in suchness.

original: dper na ras snam rgyu gcig las //
analyzed: dper na ras snam rgyu gcig las //
translated: For example, a single cloth

original: tshon gyi rkyen gyis bsgyur byas na //
analyzed: tshon gyi rkyen gyis bsgyur byas na //
translated: If it is transformed by the conditions of dye,

original: kha dog sna tshogs tha dad kyang //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs tha dad kyang //
translated: It has various different colors,

original: ras snam nyid las ga la yod //
analyzed: ras snam nyid las ga la yod //
translated: But how can it be anything other than cotton cloth?

original: log rtog yang dag rtog smin pa //
analyzed: log rtog yang dag rtog smin pa //
translated: The ripening of false imagination and correct imagination

original: sems can ye shes can 'di dag /
analyzed: sems can ye shes can 'di dag /
translated: Is these sentient beings who possess wisdom.

original: rgyu gcig rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las //
analyzed: rgyu gcig rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las //
translated: From the transformation of a single cause by conditions,

original: rig dang ma rig gnyis su snang //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig gnyis su snang //
translated: There appear the two, knowledge and ignorance.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rmi 'dra ba //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rmi 'dra ba //

original: dbugs chen phyin nas rmi sangs ltar //
analyzed: dbugs chen phyin nas rmi sangs ltar //
translated: Having let out a great sigh, it is like waking from a dream.

original: sangs rgyas bde chen byang chub sems //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bde chen byang chub sems //
translated: The great bliss of buddhahood is the bodhicitta

original: mkha' ltar khyab bdal nyid du snang //
analyzed: mkha' ltar khyab bdal nyid du snang //
translated: That appears as the all-pervading expanse like space.

original: glo bur las zhes brtags pa kun //
analyzed: glo bur las zhes brtags pa kun //
translated: All that is imputed as “accidental karma”

original: 'dus byas yin te ma skyes pas //
analyzed: 'dus byas yin te ma skyes pas //
translated: Is compounded, but since it is unborn,

original: de bzhin nyid des khyab bdal chub //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid des khyab bdal chub //
translated: It is pervaded by suchness, all-pervading and all-encompassing.

original: btsal med ye shes rang 'byung che ////🔽bam po brgyad @321a *//🔽par zug pa'o //
analyzed: btsal med ye shes rang 'byung che //// bam po brgyad @321a *// par zug pa'o //
translated: Unsearched for, self-arisen wisdom is great.

original: lang ka'i bdag po 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po 'di nyid ni //
translated: O lord of Laṅka, this is

original: yin par nges pa'i rtsa ba bdun //
analyzed: yin par nges pa'i rtsa ba bdun //
translated: The root of certainty, the seven.

original: de brtag de nyid de rtogs na //
analyzed: de brtag de nyid de rtogs na //
translated: If that is examined and realized,

original: de nyid rnam par nges pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par nges pa yin //
translated: That is the ascertainment of reality.

original: gling dang ri bo mu khyud bcas //
analyzed: gling dang ri bo mu khyud bcas //
translated: The continents, mountains, and encircling continents

original: lhun po'i rtse mo nyid nas gsal //
analyzed: lhun po'i rtse mo nyid nas gsal //
translated: Are clearly seen from the peak of Mount Meru.

original: de rnyed theg pa'i rnam grangs kun //
analyzed: de rnyed theg pa'i rnam grangs kun //
translated: Having attained that, all the enumerations of vehicles

original: de nyid chen po nyid mthong gsal //
analyzed: de nyid chen po nyid mthong gsal //
translated: Are clearly seen in the state of great suchness.

original: 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po ni //
translated: The king of the light of the world

original: gzi ldan gsal ba'i nyi ma yin //
analyzed: gzi ldan gsal ba'i nyi ma yin //
translated: Is the sun of radiant clarity.

original: chos kun yongs su rdzogs gsal ba //
analyzed: chos kun yongs su rdzogs gsal ba //
translated: The clarity that completely perfects all phenomena

original: kun snang chen po de nyid do //🔽go skabs chen po nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: kun snang chen po de nyid do // go skabs chen po nam mkha' ni //
translated: Is the great appearance of everything.🔽Just as the space of great opportunity🔽Opens up the four great elements,

original: chen po bzhi yi go 'byed ltar; ;gsang nyid 'dus pa de nyid kyis //
analyzed: chen po bzhi yi go 'byed ltar; ;gsang nyid 'dus pa de nyid kyis //
translated: The secret itself, the Guhyasamāja,

original: brjod pa'i brjod kun gsal bar 'grel //
analyzed: brjod pa'i brjod kun gsal bar 'grel //
translated: Illuminates and explains all expressions.

original: gang gis bka' yi gsang thob na //
analyzed: gang gis bka' yi gsang thob na //
translated: Whoever attains the secret of the Buddha’s speech

original: mi gang gzhan la rag ma lus //
analyzed: mi gang gzhan la rag ma lus //
translated: Is not dependent on other people.

original: gsang ba'i snying po kun chub na //
analyzed: gsang ba'i snying po kun chub na //
translated: If the secret essence is comprehended,

original: smra brjod gang la'ang btsal mi dgos //
analyzed: smra brjod gang la'ang btsal mi dgos //
translated: There is no need to search for anything to say.

original: rgyun dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba rnams //
analyzed: rgyun dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba rnams //
translated: The continuous elements

original: nam mkha'i ngang las 'byung zhing snang //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngang las 'byung zhing snang //
translated: Arise and appear from the state of space.

original: de bzhin smra brjod 'byung ba rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin smra brjod 'byung ba rnams //
translated: In the same way, all that is said

original: de nyid zab mo'i dbyings nas 'byung //
analyzed: de nyid zab mo'i dbyings nas 'byung //
translated: That itself arises from the profound dhātu.

original: don du bya ba'i rnam grangs kun //
analyzed: don du bya ba'i rnam grangs kun //
translated: All the enumerations of objects to be accomplished

original: mthar gyis 'bras bu grub par sdud //
analyzed: mthar gyis 'bras bu grub par sdud //
translated: Are ultimately included in the accomplishment of the result.🔽Although there are many enumerations and extensive expressions,

original: grangs mang rgya cher brjod mong kyang; ;de kun de bzhin nyid du 'dus //
analyzed: grangs mang rgya cher brjod mong kyang; ;de kun de bzhin nyid du 'dus //
translated: All of those are included in suchness.

original: me long gsal ba'i snying po ni //
analyzed: me long gsal ba'i snying po ni //
translated: The essence of the clear mirror

original: bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar //
analyzed: bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar //
translated: Shows the reflection of the face.

original: de nyid chos kyi me long gis //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi me long gis //
translated: That itself is the mirror of the Dharma

original: kun gyi rang bzhin @321b gsal bar byed //
analyzed: kun gyi rang bzhin @321b gsal bar byed //
translated: That illuminates the nature of all.

original: kun gyi rtsa ba rang byung bas //
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba rang byung bas //
translated: The root of all is self-originated,

original: rang bzhin cis kyang ma bcos pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin cis kyang ma bcos pa'o //
translated: The nature that is unfabricated by anything.

original: kun shes rig pa mi nub pas //
analyzed: kun shes rig pa mi nub pas //
translated: Since the knowledge of all is not obscured,

original: 'od gsal snang bas phyogs kun mthong //
analyzed: 'od gsal snang bas phyogs kun mthong //
translated: The light of clarity sees in all directions.

original: thams cad de nyid der 'dus pas //
analyzed: thams cad de nyid der 'dus pas //
translated: Since all are included in that suchness,

original: dngos med ngo bo nyid du zad //
analyzed: dngos med ngo bo nyid du zad //
translated: The nonentity is exhausted in its own nature.

original: de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas //
translated: Since all are one in suchness,

original: gnyis su bya ba'i tha snyad med //
analyzed: gnyis su bya ba'i tha snyad med //
translated: There is no convention of duality.

original: rgyu nyid 'bras bur ye rdzogs pas //
analyzed: rgyu nyid 'bras bur ye rdzogs pas //
translated: Since the cause is primordially perfect in the result,

original: re dogs gnyis bral de kho na //
analyzed: re dogs gnyis bral de kho na //
translated: There is freedom from the two—hope and fear.

original: dor bar bya ba'i dngos med pas //
analyzed: dor bar bya ba'i dngos med pas //
translated: Since there is no entity to be discarded,

original: blang bar bya ba ga la yod //
analyzed: blang bar bya ba ga la yod //
translated: How could there be anything to adopt?

original: mthong zin sbyangs zin byas pa zin //
analyzed: mthong zin sbyangs zin byas pa zin //
translated: What has been seen, what has been purified, what has been done, what has been accomplished,

original: 'dod pa grub zin spyo ma pa zin //
analyzed: 'dod pa grub zin spyo ma pa zin //
translated: what has been desired, what has been attained, what has been scolded—🔽in the same way, since things have already been accomplished,

original: de bzhin dngos po grub zin pas; ;de nyid rnyed pa nyid las byung //
analyzed: de bzhin dngos po grub zin pas; ;de nyid rnyed pa nyid las byung //
translated: they arise from the discovery of reality itself.

original: kun brtags kun nyid dben na snang //
analyzed: kun brtags kun nyid dben na snang //
translated: Since the imagined is empty of reality, it appears to all.

original: kun la sbyor bas don byed nus //
analyzed: kun la sbyor bas don byed nus //
translated: Since it is applied to all, it is able to perform a function.

original: the tshom chad pas mthun par snang //
analyzed: the tshom chad pas mthun par snang //
translated: Since doubt is eliminated, it appears in accord with that.

original: mdor na gsum nyid kho na la //
analyzed: mdor na gsum nyid kho na la //
translated: In brief, there are only three.

original: lar na gnyis nyid kho nar zad //
analyzed: lar na gnyis nyid kho nar zad //
translated: In fact, there are only two.

original: nges par gcig las med pa yin //
analyzed: nges par gcig las med pa yin //
translated: In truth, there is only one.

original: thams cad 'dir 'dus 'di las byung //
analyzed: thams cad 'dir 'dus 'di las byung //
translated: Everything is included here; it arises from this.

original: kun gyi rtsa ba 'di shes na //
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba 'di shes na //
translated: If the root of everything is known,

original: kun kyang ma bcos ji bzhin pa //
analyzed: kun kyang ma bcos ji bzhin pa //
translated: everything is unfabricated, just as it is.

original: de bzhin nyid de kun gyi mdo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de kun gyi mdo //
translated: That suchness is the summary of everything.

original: sgyu mar kun snang dngos gzhi med //
analyzed: sgyu mar kun snang dngos gzhi med //
translated: Everything appears as an illusion, without a basis.

original: chags pa med pas yid mi 'khrul //
analyzed: chags pa med pas yid mi 'khrul //
translated: Since there is no attachment, the mind is not confused.

original: nam mkha'i ngang la rang bzhin med //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngang la rang bzhin med //
translated: In the realm of space, there is no nature.

original: brtag tu med pas dngos dang bral //
analyzed: brtag tu med pas dngos dang bral //
translated: Since it cannot be examined, it is free from entities.

original: snying pa nyid las gzhan pa med //
analyzed: snying pa nyid las gzhan pa med //
translated: There is nothing other than the essence.

original: sna tshogs dag gi rgyun du 'chad //
analyzed: sna tshogs dag gi rgyun du 'chad //
translated: It is explained as the continuum of the various.

original: sgron mar snang bas mun pa sel //
analyzed: sgron mar snang bas mun pa sel //
translated: Darkness is removed by the appearance of the lamp.

original: yid bzhin nor bu nyid las byung //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu nyid las byung //
translated: It arises from the wish-fulfilling gem.

original: skye 'gag med pas 'jigs dang bral //
analyzed: skye 'gag med pas 'jigs dang bral //
translated: Since there is neither arising nor ceasing, it is free from fear.

original: @322a *// cir yang ma nges nyam mi nga //
analyzed: @322a *// cir yang ma nges nyam mi nga //
translated: It is not uncertain as anything at all.

original: chub na bya btsal kun dang bral //
analyzed: chub na bya btsal kun dang bral //
translated: When there is enlightenment, it is free from all that is sought.

original: go ba'i yul na bgrod pa med //
analyzed: go ba'i yul na bgrod pa med //
translated: There is no destination in the field of understanding.

original: de nyid chen po'i tshig re rer //
analyzed: de nyid chen po'i tshig re rer //
translated: In each word of the Great Perfection,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa brgyud //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa brgyud //
translated: the transcendent state of all victors is transmitted.

original: gzhan du rtsa ba gsum bcad kyang //
analyzed: gzhan du rtsa ba gsum bcad kyang //
translated: Even if the three roots are severed elsewhere,

original: gsang ba'i don nyid nyid las 'byung //
analyzed: gsang ba'i don nyid nyid las 'byung //
translated: the secret meaning arises from itself.

original: gang zhig gzhan du gang tshol ba //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan du gang tshol ba //
translated: Whoever seeks it elsewhere

original: de ni gol ba'i lam du zhugs //
analyzed: de ni gol ba'i lam du zhugs //
translated: has entered the path of deviation.

original: rnam rteg mun pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs //
analyzed: rnam rteg mun pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs //
translated: It is obscured by the obscuration of the darkness of conceptuality.

original: gang ma rig pa de bsgribs yin //
analyzed: gang ma rig pa de bsgribs yin //
translated: That which is ignorance is obscured.

original: rnam par rtog pa de nyid bgegs //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de nyid bgegs //
translated: That conceptuality is an obstruction.

original: bgegs ni de nyid de las byung //
analyzed: bgegs ni de nyid de las byung //
translated: The obstruction arises from that.

original: gang la rnam rtog ma byung na //🔽bdud ces bya ba ga la yod //
analyzed: gang la rnam rtog ma byung na // bdud ces bya ba ga la yod //
translated: If conceptuality does not arise,🔽how can there be a so-called māra?

original: bdud ni gang las byung zhe na //
analyzed: bdud ni gang las byung zhe na //
translated: If it is asked from where does the māra arise,

original: rtag tu 'grus las byung ba yin //
analyzed: rtag tu 'grus las byung ba yin //
translated: Always arises from diligence.

original: 'grus med nyid las bdud mi 'byung //
analyzed: 'grus med nyid las bdud mi 'byung //
translated: Mara does not arise from laziness.

original: ci phyir mi 'grus de nyid bdud //
analyzed: ci phyir mi 'grus de nyid bdud //
translated: Why is laziness itself Mara?

original: de bzhin skyon dang gol sgrib ni //
analyzed: de bzhin skyon dang gol sgrib ni //
translated: Likewise, faults, deviations, and obscurations

original: yon tan mnyam du mthong las 'byung //
analyzed: yon tan mnyam du mthong las 'byung //
translated: Arise from seeing faults and qualities as equal.

original: gal te yon tan mnyam mthong med //
analyzed: gal te yon tan mnyam mthong med //
translated: If there is no seeing faults and qualities as equal,

original: skyon dang gol sgrib ga la yod //
analyzed: skyon dang gol sgrib ga la yod //
translated: How can there be faults, deviations, and obscurations?

original: de nyid skyon dang gol sgrib yin //
analyzed: de nyid skyon dang gol sgrib yin //
translated: That itself is faults, deviations, and obscurations.

original: gang nyid mngon du ma gyur na //
analyzed: gang nyid mngon du ma gyur na //
translated: If that itself is not actualized,

original: gsang ba'i don byung gang bsrel yang //
analyzed: gsang ba'i don byung gang bsrel yang //
translated: Even if one mixes with those who have realized secret meaning,

original: nad pa sman srel thabs med bzhin //
analyzed: nad pa sman srel thabs med bzhin //
translated: It is like a sick person mixing with medicine without method.

original: nges pa'i thabs med gnas ngan 'khyam //
analyzed: nges pa'i thabs med gnas ngan 'khyam //
translated: Without a definite method, one wanders in lower realms.🔽All objects, characteristics, entities,

original: yul dang mtshan ma dngos po dang // dran rtog thos mthong ji snyed kun //
analyzed: yul dang mtshan ma dngos po dang // dran rtog thos mthong ji snyed kun //
translated: Memories, thoughts, hearing, and seeing,

original: yid la ji ltar 'gyus pa bzhin //
analyzed: yid la ji ltar 'gyus pa bzhin //
translated: However the mind moves,

original: de nyid skad cig de ltar snang //
analyzed: de nyid skad cig de ltar snang //
translated: That itself appears in that moment.

original: rtag pa mi gnas skad cig ma //
analyzed: rtag pa mi gnas skad cig ma //
translated: Permanence does not abide for a moment.

original: mi nub ma chags bde chen sems //
analyzed: mi nub ma chags bde chen sems //
translated: The mind of great bliss does not set or attach.

original: sems @322b kyang byangs las ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: sems @322b kyang byangs las ma gtogs pa //
translated: Except for the mind itself,

original: gzhan zhes gang yang med pas na //
analyzed: gzhan zhes gang yang med pas na //
translated: There is nothing else called 'other'.

original: gol sgrib bya ba ga la yod //
analyzed: gol sgrib bya ba ga la yod //
translated: How can there be any error or obscuration?

original: su zhig gol sgrib don du gnyer //
analyzed: su zhig gol sgrib don du gnyer //
translated: Who would strive for error or obscuration?

original: gang gis gol sgrib ji ltar rnyed //
analyzed: gang gis gol sgrib ji ltar rnyed //
translated: By whom and how is error or obscuration found?

original: gol sgrib nyid kyang de nyid dbyings //
analyzed: gol sgrib nyid kyang de nyid dbyings //
translated: Even error and obscuration are that very basic space.

original: btsal bas de yang de la thug /
analyzed: btsal bas de yang de la thug /
translated: When sought, that is also encountered in that.

original: gzhan du btsal zhing de las byung //
analyzed: gzhan du btsal zhing de las byung //
translated: When sought elsewhere, it arises from that.

original: bltas pas mthong ba rtogs pa med //
analyzed: bltas pas mthong ba rtogs pa med //
translated: When looked at, what is seen is not realized.

original: 'ja' snang mun khung ji bzhin no //
analyzed: 'ja' snang mun khung ji bzhin no //
translated: It is just like a rainbow appearing in a dark dungeon.

original: de nyid mthong ba'i khyad par las //
analyzed: de nyid mthong ba'i khyad par las //
translated: Due to the difference in seeing thatness,

original: spyod lam dngos bzhi gang spyad kyang //
analyzed: spyod lam dngos bzhi gang spyad kyang //
translated: no matter what conduct or four activities are engaged in,

original: 'ching bar mi 'gyur 'grol 'gyur thabs //
analyzed: 'ching bar mi 'gyur 'grol 'gyur thabs //
translated: there is no bondage, only the method for liberation.

original: thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas mchog /
analyzed: thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas mchog /
translated: All are trained in that, the supreme abode of the path.🔽Those who seek the meaning of that

original: gang nyid don gyi rjes tshol zhing; ;gol sgrib yongs su gcod 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: gang nyid don gyi rjes tshol zhing; ;gol sgrib yongs su gcod 'dod pa'i //
translated: and wish to completely eliminate error and obscuration

original: mtha' sel rnal 'byor sems dpa' pa //
analyzed: mtha' sel rnal 'byor sems dpa' pa //
translated: are yogis who eliminate extremes.

original: gang la zhen pa'i phyogs bzung ste //
analyzed: gang la zhen pa'i phyogs bzung ste //
translated: Having taken a side of clinging to something,

original: dbus mthar lta ba de bzung bas //
analyzed: dbus mthar lta ba de bzung bas //
translated: the view of the center and extremes is taken.

original: cho ga'i nges blo brtan pa can //
analyzed: cho ga'i nges blo brtan pa can //
translated: Those with a firm mind of certainty in the rite

original: de kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi //
analyzed: de kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi //
translated: are all indeed yogis.

original: yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor //
analyzed: yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor //
translated: They are not really skilled in the authentic meaning.

original: spyod lam rnal du 'byor mod kyi //
analyzed: spyod lam rnal du 'byor mod kyi //
translated: They are skilled in the conduct of daily activity,

original: yang dag don du yong ma 'byor //
analyzed: yang dag don du yong ma 'byor //
translated: But they are not really skilled in the authentic meaning.

original: phyogs su lta la zhen mod kyi //
analyzed: phyogs su lta la zhen mod kyi //
translated: They are attached to the views of the directions,

original: dam pa'i don du yongs ma zhen //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du yongs ma zhen //
translated: But they are not really attached to the ultimate.

original: glo bur las ro tshor mod kyi //
analyzed: glo bur las ro tshor mod kyi //
translated: They experience the taste of adventitious karma,

original: chos nyid kyi ni ro ma tshor //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi ni ro ma tshor //
translated: But they do not experience the taste of dharmatā.

original: bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi //
analyzed: bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi //
translated: They say they are free of the position of selflessness,🔽But they are not free from the view of the directions.

original: phyogs su lta dang yang ma bral; ;brtul zhugs rtog pa choms mod kyi //
analyzed: phyogs su lta dang yang ma bral; ;brtul zhugs rtog pa choms mod kyi //
translated: They destroy the concepts of yogic conduct,

original: gzung 'dzin rtog pa yang ma choms //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin rtog pa yang ma choms //
translated: But they do not destroy the concepts of percepts and perceivers.

original: dbus mthar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
analyzed: dbus mthar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ba //
translated: The yogi who conceptualizes the middle and end

original: brjod pa tshig lam sgron ma yis //
analyzed: brjod pa tshig lam sgron ma yis //
translated: With the lamp of the path of verbal expressions

original: yang @323a *// dag dbu ma'i gser tshol ba //
analyzed: yang @323a *// dag dbu ma'i gser tshol ba //
translated: Seeks the gold of the utterly pure middle.

original: rtog 'dod spre'u 'di gzung byas nas //
analyzed: rtog 'dod spre'u 'di gzung byas nas //
translated: Having caught this monkey of conceptual desire,

original: rkun mo byil gdags par bya //🔽gser khung skar khung kun bkag ste //
analyzed: rkun mo byil gdags par bya // gser khung skar khung kun bkag ste //
translated: One should tie it up with a rope.🔽Having blocked all the cracks and holes in the gold mine,

original: re'u cha phang phung bshig nas ni //
analyzed: re'u cha phang phung bshig nas ni //
translated: Having destroyed the heaps of straw,

original: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na //
analyzed: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na //
translated: Having opened the door of the king’s treasury,

original: de dag longs spyod rdzogs bdag po //
analyzed: de dag longs spyod rdzogs bdag po //
translated: One becomes the lord of enjoyments.

original: yang dag dbu ma'i lam tshol ba //
analyzed: yang dag dbu ma'i lam tshol ba //
translated: Searching for the path of the middle way.

original: rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya //
analyzed: rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya //
translated: The five faults of conceptualization should be abandoned.🔽The mountain of coarse conceptualization,🔽the movement of signs, feeling,

original: rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang // mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang // byung tshor 'byung ba rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang // mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang // byung tshor 'byung ba rnam pa lnga //

analyzed: sprin chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang // na bun gtams dang ban bun gnyis //

analyzed: g-yeng dang 'thibs dang 'gog pa dang // rtag tu med pa kho na yin //

analyzed: 'di dag dbu ma'i skyon yin zhes //

analyzed: dbu mar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'dod //

original: dbu ma nges pa'i lam tshol ba //
analyzed: dbu ma nges pa'i lam tshol ba //

original: dgon pa'i rgyun du dben bzung ste //
analyzed: dgon pa'i rgyun du dben bzung ste //

original: tshad ma gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i blos //
analyzed: tshad ma gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i blos //

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcod pa //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcod pa //

original: yod med sngon rtog gang las byung //
analyzed: yod med sngon rtog gang las byung //

original: brtags pas rtog pa rtas las 'byung //
analyzed: brtags pas rtog pa rtas las 'byung //

original: rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur //

original: des ni gnas ngan gsum du min //
analyzed: des ni gnas ngan gsum du min //

original: rtog pa gang las byung zhen //
analyzed: rtog pa gang las byung zhen //

original: mtshan ma nyid las byung ba yin //
analyzed: mtshan ma nyid las byung ba yin //

original: mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na //
analyzed: mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na //

original: mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //

original: des ni 'dod khams tha mar min //
analyzed: des ni 'dod khams tha mar min //

original: mtshan ma de yang ji ltar na //
analyzed: mtshan ma de yang ji ltar na //

original: de yang 'byung ba dag las @324a *//
analyzed: de yang 'byung ba dag las @324a *//

original: byung; ;dran pa skyon dang zhir shes na //
analyzed: byung; ;dran pa skyon dang zhir shes na //

analyzed: rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed //

analyzed: 'dod khams gnyis par de dag min // rgyu ba de yang gang de bzhin //

original: de yang de ltar byung ba yin //
analyzed: de yang de ltar byung ba yin //

original: de nyid de ltar shes gyur na //
analyzed: de nyid de ltar shes gyur na //

original: skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed //
analyzed: skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed //

original: 'dod khams gsum po de yang min //
analyzed: 'dod khams gsum po de yang min //
translated: “The desire realm is not the third.

original: de nyid de ltar der brtsad na //
analyzed: de nyid de ltar der brtsad na //
translated: When one investigates reality in that way,

original: gang de phyi nang nyid kho na //
analyzed: gang de phyi nang nyid kho na //

original: de nyid skyon du rab shes na //
analyzed: de nyid skyon du rab shes na //

original: 'gag dang skye ba ga la yod //
analyzed: 'gag dang skye ba ga la yod //

original: de ni 'dod khams bzhi bar min //
analyzed: de ni 'dod khams bzhi bar min //

original: de yang gang las skye mched na //
analyzed: de yang gang las skye mched na //

original: sems kyi chos las gyur pa ste //
analyzed: sems kyi chos las gyur pa ste //

original: sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na //
analyzed: sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na //

original: sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur //

original: phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la //
analyzed: phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la //

original: sems kyi smig rgyu lta bur 'dod //
analyzed: sems kyi smig rgyu lta bur 'dod //

original: yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol //
analyzed: yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol //

analyzed: de shes 'dod khams lnga par min // de sems yod pa'i dngos po 'am //
translated: That is not the fifth stage of the desire realm.🔽That is not seen as an existent entity

original: med ces bya bar mi bltabs //
analyzed: med ces bya bar mi bltabs //

original: ya mtshan can du ltung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ya mtshan can du ltung mi 'gyur //

original: bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas //
analyzed: bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas //

original: bsam gtan skyon du de mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam gtan skyon du de mi 'gyur //

original: 'du shes rjes su ma 'brangs pas //
analyzed: 'du shes rjes su ma 'brangs pas //

original: sems can gnas su de yod min //
analyzed: sems can gnas su de yod min //

analyzed: kun 'byung kun gzhi nyid mthong bas //

original: zhi ba'i gnas su yang ma yin //
analyzed: zhi ba'i gnas su yang ma yin //

original: zhibs pas zhi bar mi lta bas //
analyzed: zhibs pas zhi bar mi lta bas //

analyzed: rang rgyal gnas su'ang gal yin //

analyzed: sems dpa' de yang der ma yin //

original: stong nyid mnyam pa'i dbu ma la //
analyzed: stong nyid mnyam pa'i dbu ma la //

analyzed: so so tha dad dbyer med pas //

analyzed: sa yi rim pa spyod ma yin //

analyzed: sems nyid gyin 'da' skad cig mas //

original: mi g-yo rgyun du dran par bya //
analyzed: mi g-yo rgyun du dran par bya //

original: de ltar de la mnyam gzhag na //
analyzed: de ltar de la mnyam gzhag na //

analyzed: rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung //

analyzed: drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang // mngon par dang ni ye shes 'byung //

analyzed: drod ni g-yo dang thob pa dang // rtags ni 'byung dang brtan pa dang // cho 'phrul 'byung dang rdzogs pa dang // gang du rig pa thams cad gsal //

original: der ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin //
analyzed: der ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin //

analyzed: dper na mun pa sangs pa dang // snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang // kun du mthong dang thams cad gsal //

analyzed: des na de yi khyad par gyis //

analyzed: gang du chags pa'i mun bsal te //

analyzed: ji ltar rlung gis sbrin phyag ltar //

analyzed: skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis; ;mun pa'i khams de 'phyags par 'gyur //

analyzed: ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na //

analyzed: de nyid snang bar gyur pa bzhin //

analyzed: skad cig ma yi de rig na //

analyzed: sngo na nas zhen pa'i mun pa sel //

original: de gang rig pa de dag ni //
analyzed: de gang rig pa de dag ni //

analyzed: de nyid de yi sgo phye zhing //

analyzed: de bzhin mig dang de ldan pas //

analyzed: mthong thos tshig lam le'u bzhir bsdebs //

analyzed: sa pa yin pas de la ltos //

analyzed: mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis //

analyzed: de la tha snyad cig rjod kyang //

analyzed: nges ma nges kyi dmigs mi phyed //

analyzed: bslab pa'i sa dang lam ma yin //

original: tshig lam 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang //
analyzed: tshig lam 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang //

analyzed: gzhan la smra bar bya ma yin //

analyzed: gal te gang zhig gang smra ba //

analyzed: log smra rdo rje bka' rkun pa'o //

analyzed: nges pa'i blo shes ma bye bar //

analyzed: tshig lam yi ges khrid nas ni /

original: gang ma nges par lam brjod na //
analyzed: gang ma nges par lam brjod na //

original: srog chags kun gyi srog 'phrogs pa //
analyzed: srog chags kun gyi srog 'phrogs pa //

original: ma nges chos smra de bas lji //
analyzed: ma nges chos smra de bas lji //

original: des na mtha' dbus mnyam nyid la //
analyzed: des na mtha' dbus mnyam nyid la //

analyzed: btud de cig car gang 'jug pa; ;rnal 'byor gnas yun ring thung dang // gang 'phro yod dang med pa dang // nam zhig mnyam pa'i khar ma lus //
translated: At some point, without falling into mere equality,

analyzed: de la de bzhin der bzhag na //

original: de ma thag tu de nyid snang //
analyzed: de ma thag tu de nyid snang //

original: de las de bzhin ma g-yos na //
analyzed: de las de bzhin ma g-yos na //

analyzed: grong khyer snang bar de mi 'gro /

original: de la de ltar ma chags na //
analyzed: de la de ltar ma chags na //

analyzed: snang ba med par ga la 'gro /

analyzed: de nyid mngon du gyur pas na //

original: zhi ba'i gnas su de dag min //
analyzed: zhi ba'i gnas su de dag min //

analyzed: yod dang med ba'i mtha' ched na //

original: mtha' las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor nyid //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor nyid //

original: gang 'dir nges pa dam pa'o zhes //
analyzed: gang 'dir nges pa dam pa'o zhes //

analyzed: gang dag 'di ltar dam @325b 'cha' ba //

analyzed: gang la re dvogs med pa yi //

analyzed: gol sgrib nyid du nges par snang //

analyzed: ci phyir dbus mtha' 'byed pas na //

analyzed: dbus yod mtha' yang rang bzhin 'byung //

translated: Without a middle, the extremes also do not exist.🔽The distinction between the middle and extremes is itself

original: mtha' dang dbus bral de kho na //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus bral de kho na //

original: mi gnas mi len mi 'byed cing //
analyzed: mi gnas mi len mi 'byed cing //

original: ci yang ma yin mthong thos med //
analyzed: ci yang ma yin mthong thos med //

analyzed: ci yang ma 'byed bya dang bral; ;snang med snang ba'i tha snyad bral //

original: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni //
analyzed: bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni //

original: mi bsam de bzhin nyid du gzhag /
analyzed: mi bsam de bzhin nyid du gzhag /

original: bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams kun //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams kun //
