original: bsam med de bzhin nyid las med; ;sa dang rnam thar la sogs pa //
analyzed: bsam med de bzhin nyid las med; ;sa dang rnam thar la sogs pa //
translated: The dharmakāya, liberation, and so on

original: chos sku byang chub dkar po'i phyogs //
analyzed: chos sku byang chub dkar po'i phyogs //
translated: Are the white side of the enlightenment of the dharmakāya.

original: kun kyang bsam du med pa yi //
analyzed: kun kyang bsam du med pa yi //
translated: All of them are inconceivable

original: gol sgrib chen por gyur pa yin //
analyzed: gol sgrib chen por gyur pa yin //
translated: And become a great deviation and obscuration.

original: 'da' dka' chen po'i dka' thub ni; ;ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na //
analyzed: 'da' dka' chen po'i dka' thub ni; ;ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na //
translated: Is the unfabricated suchness itself.

original: dpag med rgyal ba 'da' bar dka'//
analyzed: dpag med rgyal ba 'da' bar dka'//
translated: The immeasurable Victor is difficult to transcend.

original: gang gzugs med las gang 'dzin gol //
analyzed: gang gzugs med las gang 'dzin gol //
translated: One who holds to anything from the formless realm is deluded.

original: bdal khyab chen po'i sa 'di ni //
analyzed: bdal khyab chen po'i sa 'di ni //
translated: This ground of the great, pervasive expanse

original: ye nas ma bgrod rang bzhin bkod //
analyzed: ye nas ma bgrod rang bzhin bkod //
translated: Has never been traversed, but is naturally arrayed.

original: sa 'dir ma chub gang yang med //
analyzed: sa 'dir ma chub gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing whatsoever that is not awakened on this ground.

original: gang 'dir sa bkod gang bgrod gol //
analyzed: gang 'dir sa bkod gang bgrod gol //
translated: One who traverses the ground array here is deluded.

original: de bzhin de rig ye 'byung la //
analyzed: de bzhin de rig ye 'byung la //
translated: In the same way, in the primordial occurrence of awareness

original: khyad par rim par 'byung 'dod gang //
analyzed: khyad par rim par 'byung 'dod gang //
translated: Those who desire a special, successive occurrence

original: gang 'dir rmongs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang 'dir rmongs pa kho na'o //
translated: Are simply deluded right here.

original: rang byung de las nges par grol //
analyzed: rang byung de las nges par grol //
translated: They are definitely liberated from that self-originated state.

original: bsam yul dmigs su med pa la //
analyzed: bsam yul dmigs su med pa la //
translated: In the non-apprehensible object of thought,

original: bang snyoms chen po'i rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: bang snyoms chen po'i rnal 'byor pa //
translated: The yogin of the great evenness

original: ji bzhin pa nyid yin bzhin du //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa nyid yin bzhin du //
translated: Is in the state of just being as it is.

original: lus dbyen sems 'chos grol sa @326a *//
analyzed: lus dbyen sems 'chos grol sa @326a *//
translated: The liberated ground is entered by separating the body and correcting the mind.

original: zhugs // kun grol chen po de nyid la //
analyzed: zhugs // kun grol chen po de nyid la //
translated: In that great liberation of everything,

original: bcings grol med par nges bzhin du //
analyzed: bcings grol med par nges bzhin du //
translated: While being certain that there is neither bondage nor liberation,

original: gang 'dir bka' thub rtog pas bcings //
analyzed: gang 'dir bka' thub rtog pas bcings //
translated: Here, one is bound by the austerity of the words.

original: rnam grol chen po nyid las gol; ;ye nas ma bcos nyid kho nar //
analyzed: rnam grol chen po nyid las gol; ;ye nas ma bcos nyid kho nar //
translated: Whoever abides in the uncontrived primordial

original: gang gnas de nyid de kho na //
analyzed: gang gnas de nyid de kho na //
translated: Is abiding in thatness itself.

original: de la gol sa ga la yod //
analyzed: de la gol sa ga la yod //
translated: How could there be any straying there?

original: gol sgribs nyid kyang de kho na //
analyzed: gol sgribs nyid kyang de kho na //
translated: Even straying and obscuration are that itself.

original: de skad ces bgros pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi bcings pa las yongs su grol te rtsol gyi the tshom chad par gyur to //🔽sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
analyzed: de skad ces bgros pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi bcings pa las yongs su grol te rtsol gyi the tshom chad par gyur to // sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las /
translated: Thus, when they had discussed this, the spiritual warriors of lesser capacity, headed by the ruler of Lanka, were completely liberated from their bonds and their doubts were severed.🔽This was the fifty-fourth chapter in the great tantra of the Great Assembly,🔽the Tantra of the Questions of the King of Lanka.

original: chos thams cad kyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: THE ROOT🔽THEN, THE BODhisattva great being

original: de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /🔽gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gang gi rtsa ba yongs su dris pa /
analyzed: de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des / gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gang gi rtsa ba yongs su dris pa /
translated: lord of Lanka asked the master of the secret teaching:

original: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
translated: “Oh master of the secret teaching,

original: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bgyi ba de gang lags /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bgyi ba de gang lags /
translated: what is the root of all phenomena?

original: de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi /
analyzed: de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi /
translated: How is it to be understood?

original: de skad ces dris pa las /
analyzed: de skad ces dris pa las /
translated: Thus it was asked.

original: gsang ba'i bdag pos smras pa /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag pos smras pa /
translated: The Lord of Secrets said:

original: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: kye lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: “Oh, Lord of Lanka,

original: gang du dri ba dam pa 'di ni legs so //
analyzed: gang du dri ba dam pa 'di ni legs so //
translated: this sacred question is excellent!

original: shin tu rab tu legs so //
analyzed: shin tu rab tu legs so //
translated: It is very good, very good indeed.

original: gang chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems la bya'o //
analyzed: gang chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems la bya'o //
translated: That which is called the root of all phenomena should be understood as the root of bodhicitta.

original: de ni 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood in the following way:

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi chos nyid dang / sems @326b can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi chos nyid dang / sems @326b can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: it should be understood as the dharmatā of the mind of all buddhas and the dharmatā of the mind of all sentient beings.

original: de ni mun snang gnyis su snang yin te /
analyzed: de ni mun snang gnyis su snang yin te /
translated: That is the appearance of both darkness and light.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: de'ang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de gsang ba'i gnas pad mo can zhes bya ba gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sprul pa'i lhums /
analyzed: de'ang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de gsang ba'i gnas pad mo can zhes bya ba gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sprul pa'i lhums /
translated: in that way, the Bhagavān, the Lord of the Supreme Secret, in the secret place called the Lotus, in the womb of the emanation of the uṣṇīṣa cakravartin,

original: gsang ba mchog gi pho brang na skad cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi pho brang na skad cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
translated: in the palace of the supreme secret, remained for a moment. At that time,

original: gang skyes bu dam pa dpag tu med pa dag de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / zhu bar bsdogs pa dang / the tshom chad nas slar dong ba dang / gang kho bo 'khor der 'dus par gyur par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag cag gis byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ma mthong ma dmigs lags so //🔽yang dag par ma rnyed nges par ma 'tshal ba lags so //🔽bgrod pas ma khyab lags na 'di gang na mchis /🔽gang du btsal /🔽gang zhig lags /🔽gang la bgyi; gang du stor /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gang skyes bu dam pa dpag tu med pa dag de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / zhu bar bsdogs pa dang / the tshom chad nas slar dong ba dang / gang kho bo 'khor der 'dus par gyur par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag gis byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ma mthong ma dmigs lags so // yang dag par ma rnyed nges par ma 'tshal ba lags so // bgrod pas ma khyab lags na 'di gang na mchis / gang du btsal / gang zhig lags / gang la bgyi; gang du stor / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Bhagavān said, Anantamati, it is like this: in the past, incalculable eons ago, beyond the number of atoms in the four continents, there was a world called 'Unwavering Light,' and a buddha called 'King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon.'🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the lifespan of the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was incalculable eons, and the lifespan of the sentient beings in that world was also incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons, and the sentient beings in that world were also in the world for incalculable eons.🔽 Anantamati, at that time, the Buddha King of the Radiance of the Sun and Moon was in the world for incalculable eons,

original: dus kyi skad cig ma 'di nyid du bstan du gsol /🔽bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: dus kyi skad cig ma 'di nyid du bstan du gsol / bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said, Anantamati, in the past, countless eons ago, beyond the eons of the past, in an eon named 'Appearance of Jewels,' in a world named 'Appearance of Various Jewels,' there was a world system named 'Appearance of Various Jewels.'🔽 In that world system, there was a buddha named 'King of the Lamp of the Dharma of the Appearance of Various Jewels.'

original: 'di bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
analyzed: 'di bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
translated: He was a tathāgata, an arhat, a fully enlightened buddha, perfect in wisdom and conduct, a sugata, a knower of the world, an unsurpassed guide for those to be trained, a teacher of gods and humans, a buddha, a bhagavān.🔽 In that world system, there was a great trichiliocosm, and in that great trichiliocosm, there were a thousand suns and moons, a thousand Sumeru mountains, a thousand four continents, a thousand Jambudvīpas, a thousand Jambudvīpa continents, a thousand kings of the gandharvas, a thousand dwellings of the nāgas, a thousand dwellings of the asuras, a thousand dwellings of the four world guardians, a thousand dwellings of the Thirty-three gods, a thousand dwellings of the Yāma gods, a thousand dwellings of the gods who delight in creating, a thousand dwellings of the gods who delight in pleasure, a thousand dwellings of the Brahma gods, and a thousand great Brahma gods.🔽In that great trichiliocosm, there were a thousand great oceans, a thousand great Merus, a thousand great Sumerus, a thousand great Cakravāḍas, a thousand great Cakravāḍa mountains, a thousand great four continents, a thousand great Jambudvīpas, a thousand great Jambudvīpa continents, a thousand great kings of the gandharvas, a thousand great dwellings of the nāgas, a thousand great dwellings of the asuras, a thousand great dwellings of the four world guardians, a thousand great dwellings of the Thirty-three gods, a thousand great dwellings of the Yāma gods, a thousand great dwellings of the gods who delight in creating, a thousand great dwellings of the gods who delight in pleasure, a thousand great dwellings of the Brahma gods, and a thousand great Brahma gods.🔽 In that great trichiliocosm, there were a thousand great oceans, a thousand great Merus, a thousand great Sumerus, a thousand great Cakravāḍas, a thousand great

original: bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Bhagavat said this:

original: sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po /
translated: “Great being!

original: byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ni sgrib pas ma mthong /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ni sgrib pas ma mthong /
translated: The so-called essence of enlightenment, the root of all dharmas, is not seen due to obscurations.

original: med pas ma dmigs /
analyzed: med pas ma dmigs /
translated: It is not perceived due to nonexistence.

original: zab pas ma rnyed /🔽@327a *// bka' bsam shes /
analyzed: zab pas ma rnyed / @327a *// bka' bsam shes /
translated: It is not found due to profundity.🔽It is not understood due to the words.

original: myur bas ma slebs /
analyzed: myur bas ma slebs /
translated: It is not reached due to speed.

original: yangs pas ma khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: yangs pas ma khyab pa yin te /
translated: It is not pervaded due to vastness.

original: 'di mun pa'i khams na yod /
analyzed: 'di mun pa'i khams na yod /
translated: It exists in the realm of darkness.

original: grong khyer gsum du btsal /
analyzed: grong khyer gsum du btsal /
translated: It is sought in the three cities.

original: 'di yan lag dang / mdo dang / rtsa ba yin /
analyzed: 'di yan lag dang / mdo dang / rtsa ba yin /
translated: This is the branch, the sūtra, and the root.

original: ngo bo de kho na nyid la bya /
analyzed: ngo bo de kho na nyid la bya /
translated: The essence is to be taken as thatness.

original: mun pa'i khams su stor /
analyzed: mun pa'i khams su stor /
translated: It is lost in the realm of darkness.

original: sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Great being!

original: de lta bas na mun pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir 'di'i rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na mun pa 'di bsal ba'i phyir 'di'i rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in order to dispel this darkness, one should become skilled in its nature.

original: de bzhin du ngo bo dang / mtshan nyid dang / yan lag dang / ji srid pa'i yun dang / las dang / mun pa'i rnam grangs dang / dpe la sogs dang; bsal ba'i thabs rnams la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ngo bo dang / mtshan nyid dang / yan lag dang / ji srid pa'i yun dang / las dang / mun pa'i rnam grangs dang / dpe la sogs dang; bsal ba'i thabs rnams la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should become skilled in the essence, the characteristics, the branches, the duration, the function, the synonyms of darkness, the examples, and so forth, and the methods of dispelling.”

original: 'di la nan tan du bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la nan tan du bya'o //
translated: One should be diligent in this.

original: gang mun pa'i khams pa dag dang / cha gcig tu shes bya'o //
analyzed: gang mun pa'i khams pa dag dang / cha gcig tu shes bya'o //
translated: Those who are in the realm of darkness should understand this as one part.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this was said, I said the following:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‘Bhagavān,

original: mun pa 'di ci las byung /🔽mun pa 'di yi rang bzhin ci /🔽mun pa 'di yi ngo bo gang /
analyzed: mun pa 'di ci las byung / mun pa 'di yi rang bzhin ci / mun pa 'di yi ngo bo gang /
translated: where does this darkness come from?🔽What is the nature of this darkness?🔽What is the essence of this darkness?

original: mun pa 'di yi mtshan nyid ci /🔽mun pa 'di yi yan lag tu /
analyzed: mun pa 'di yi mtshan nyid ci / mun pa 'di yi yan lag tu /
translated: What are the characteristics of this darkness?🔽What are the branches of this darkness?

original: mun pa 'di yi rtsa ba gang /
analyzed: mun pa 'di yi rtsa ba gang /
translated: What is the root of this darkness?

original: mun pa 'di ji srid cig gnas /
analyzed: mun pa 'di ji srid cig gnas /
translated: How long does this darkness last?

original: mun pa 'di ci la sgrib /🔽mun pa 'di'i bye brag du /
analyzed: mun pa 'di ci la sgrib / mun pa 'di'i bye brag du /
translated: What does this darkness obscure?🔽What are the distinctions of this darkness?

original: mun pa 'di gang dang mthun /🔽mun pa 'di gang du 'thibs /
analyzed: mun pa 'di gang dang mthun / mun pa 'di gang du 'thibs /
translated: With what is this darkness in accord?🔽Where does this darkness gather?

original: mun pa 'di gang gis sel /
analyzed: mun pa 'di gang gis sel /
translated: By what is this darkness dispelled?

original: mun pa zhes ci'i phyir bgyi /
analyzed: mun pa zhes ci'i phyir bgyi /
translated: Why is it called darkness?

original: 'di ci phyir 'thibs /
analyzed: 'di ci phyir 'thibs /
translated: Why does it gather?

original: dra bas gang du 'dus /
analyzed: dra bas gang du 'dus /
translated: In what net does it gather?

original: 'di @327b bshad du gsol /
analyzed: 'di @327b bshad du gsol /
translated: Please explain this.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: 'di bshad du gsol /
analyzed: 'di bshad du gsol /
translated: please explain this.’

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
translated: When this was said, that bhagavān said the following:

original: sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po /
translated: ‘Mahāsattva,

original: mun pa dang / snang bas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni gzhi dang / rtsa ba med par 'dus par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mun pa dang / snang bas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni gzhi dang / rtsa ba med par 'dus par shes par bya'o //
translated: The root of all phenomena subsumed within darkness and light is the basis, and it should be understood that the basis is subsumed without a root.

original: de ltar ston pa'i mdo ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ltar ston pa'i mdo ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The sūtras that teach this are as follows:

original: sangs rgyas byang chub 'byung ba yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub 'byung ba yi //
translated: The arising of buddhahood

original: bskyed cing snying po de nyid de //
analyzed: bskyed cing snying po de nyid de //
translated: is the generation of that essence.

original: pad mo kha 'bus snying po ltar //
analyzed: pad mo kha 'bus snying po ltar //
translated: Like the heart of a blooming lotus,

original: rtsa ba 'khor ba'i 'dam pa yod //
analyzed: rtsa ba 'khor ba'i 'dam pa yod //
translated: the root is in the mud of saṃsāra.

original: rtsa ba thams cad 'byung ba yi //
analyzed: rtsa ba thams cad 'byung ba yi //
translated: The root of all that arises

original: rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba ni //
analyzed: rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba ni //
translated: is the rootless root.🔽The root of all phenomena

original: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin; ;khams gsum 'di dag nyid du 'dus //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin; ;khams gsum 'di dag nyid du 'dus //
translated: is subsumed within these three realms.

original: chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'//
analyzed: chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'//
translated: This Dharma is profound and difficult to see.

original: rtogs par yang ni mi nus te //
analyzed: rtogs par yang ni mi nus te //
translated: It cannot be realized

original: mthar phyi nas la gnas pa yin //
analyzed: mthar phyi nas la gnas pa yin //
translated: but is present in the end.

original: skyes bus kyang ni mthong ma yin //
analyzed: skyes bus kyang ni mthong ma yin //
translated: It is not seen by a person.

original: med pas stong pa'i chos nyid 'di //
analyzed: med pas stong pa'i chos nyid 'di //
translated: This emptiness of nonexistent phenomena

original: yod pa'i dngos por yang mi dmigs //
analyzed: yod pa'i dngos por yang mi dmigs //
translated: is also not observed as an existent thing.

original: dmigs dang mi dmigs tshig lam chad //
analyzed: dmigs dang mi dmigs tshig lam chad //
translated: The path of words is cut off, whether observed or not observed.

original: rnam par mi rtog skye ba med //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog skye ba med //
translated: It is nonconceptual and unborn.

original: gsal bas dus mtha' med pa ru //
analyzed: gsal bas dus mtha' med pa ru //
translated: Because of clarity, it is limitless in time.

original: ma lus khyab par kun btsal yang //
analyzed: ma lus khyab par kun btsal yang //
translated: Even if one searches everywhere

original: 'di zhes bya ba'i dngos po zhig /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba'i dngos po zhig /
translated: For something called “this thing,”

original: mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not find it, nor will one find it in the future.🔽Even if the wise were to examine

original: mkhas pas dus mtha' med pa ru; ;shin tu bsgrims te cir brtags kyang //
analyzed: mkhas pas dus mtha' med pa ru; ;shin tu bsgrims te cir brtags kyang //
translated: With the utmost precision,

original: gang 'dir ci yang mthor ba med //🔽mgyogs pas dus mtha' med pa ru //
analyzed: gang 'dir ci yang mthor ba med // mgyogs pas dus mtha' med pa ru //
translated: Nothing whatsoever is seen here.🔽Even if one were to run

original: nyam thag chad pas brgyugs kyang ni //🔽da @328a *// dung de nyid dbyings 'di las //
analyzed: nyam thag chad pas brgyugs kyang ni // da @328a *// dung de nyid dbyings 'di las //
translated: With exhaustion and fatigue for limitless time,🔽One will not go anywhere

original: gar yang ma phyin phyin pa med //
analyzed: gar yang ma phyin phyin pa med //
translated: From this very space.

original: skye med chos kyi sdong po la //
analyzed: skye med chos kyi sdong po la //
translated: On the trunk of the unborn Dharma

original: rnam par bzhi yi yan lag gol //
analyzed: rnam par bzhi yi yan lag gol //
translated: Are the four branches that spread out.

original: byang chub bla med snying por smin //
analyzed: byang chub bla med snying por smin //
translated: It ripens into the essence of unsurpassed awakening.

original: de ni kun 'byung byang chub shing //
analyzed: de ni kun 'byung byang chub shing //
translated: That is the origin of the tree of awakening.

original: 'jug pa don la 'dod pa'i khams //
analyzed: 'jug pa don la 'dod pa'i khams //
translated: The desire realm is asserted to be the object of engagement.

original: mngon med 'dzin pa gzugs khams so //
analyzed: mngon med 'dzin pa gzugs khams so //
translated: The form realm is the imperceptible grasping.

original: snang med ma chad gzugs med nyid //🔽gang de ched las byed las 'gyur //
analyzed: snang med ma chad gzugs med nyid // gang de ched las byed las 'gyur //
translated: The formless realm is the absence of appearances and incompleteness.🔽That is due to the function of the specific [realm].

original: yul du gang 'gyur 'jug pa nyid //
analyzed: yul du gang 'gyur 'jug pa nyid //
translated: Whatever becomes an object is engagement.

original: gang la 'jug pa de rnams shes //
analyzed: gang la 'jug pa de rnams shes //
translated: And those who engage in it know it.

original: de yul mun pa'i khams gyur kyang //
analyzed: de yul mun pa'i khams gyur kyang //
translated: Even though the realm of darkness is its object,

original: mun pa'i khams na de nyid snang //🔽snang dang snang ba'i 'od byung ba //
analyzed: mun pa'i khams na de nyid snang // snang dang snang ba'i 'od byung ba //
translated: In the realm of darkness, it is illuminated.🔽The light that arises from illumination

original: skye 'byung rtsa ba'i snying po nyid //
analyzed: skye 'byung rtsa ba'i snying po nyid //
translated: Is the root and essence of arising and origination.

original: phyogs rig des mi rig pa yi //
analyzed: phyogs rig des mi rig pa yi //
translated: The one who knows the direction does not know

original: ngo bo nyid med de nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med de nyid do //
translated: The non-entity that is suchness.🔽Just like gold lost in the darkness,

original: mun khung gser stor ji bzhin du; ;'khor ba mun pa'i mun nag tu //🔽rin chen gser dang 'dra ba yi //
analyzed: mun khung gser stor ji bzhin du; ;'khor ba mun pa'i mun nag tu // rin chen gser dang 'dra ba yi //
translated: In the darkness of samsara,🔽This precious bodhicitta

original: byang chub sems 'di stor bar gyur //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'di stor bar gyur //
translated: Has been lost, like gold.

original: mun pa'i khams su gyur pa dag /
analyzed: mun pa'i khams su gyur pa dag /
translated: Those who have become the realm of darkness

original: mun pa'i 'du shes nyid du 'byung //
analyzed: mun pa'i 'du shes nyid du 'byung //
translated: Give rise to the perception of darkness.

original: mun pa'i khams pas gang shes pa //
analyzed: mun pa'i khams pas gang shes pa //
translated: Whatever is known by the realm of darkness

original: phra mo'i cha shas tsam yan chad //
analyzed: phra mo'i cha shas tsam yan chad //
translated: Is no more than a subtle part.

original: gang 'di blo chung byis pa rnams //
analyzed: gang 'di blo chung byis pa rnams //
translated: This is for the sake of those with small minds,

original: ched du gleng zhing gang brjod pa //
analyzed: ched du gleng zhing gang brjod pa //
translated: The ones who speak and express themselves.

original: blo ldan kun la 'di brjod kyi //
analyzed: blo ldan kun la 'di brjod kyi //
translated: This is spoken to all the wise ones,

original: blun po'i ched du shes par gyis //
analyzed: blun po'i ched du shes par gyis //
translated: But understand it for the sake of the foolish.

original: 'di yang 'di ltar yongs su snang //
analyzed: 'di yang 'di ltar yongs su snang //
translated: This also appears in this way.

original: yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba ste //
translated: The root and the branches are

original: 'byed dang 'grol dang 'byin pa yin //
analyzed: 'byed dang 'grol dang 'byin pa yin //
translated: the divisions, the liberations, and the extractions.🔽The six branches that are renowned

original: yan lag drug tu gang grags @328b pa; ;mthong thos tshor myong reg shes drug /
analyzed: yan lag drug tu gang grags @328b pa; ;mthong thos tshor myong reg shes drug /
translated: are the six of seeing, hearing, feeling, tasting, touching, and knowing.

original: 'byung 'jug gcod pa'i yan lag yin //
analyzed: 'byung 'jug gcod pa'i yan lag yin //
translated: They are the branches that cut off the entry and exit.

original: lang ka'i bdag po /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /
translated: Lord of Lanka,

original: mdo bzhi ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: mdo bzhi ni gang zhe na /
translated: what are the four sutras?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: gzhi'i mdo dang / dmigs pa'i mdo dang / snang ba'i mdo dang / 'jug pa'i mdo'o //
analyzed: gzhi'i mdo dang / dmigs pa'i mdo dang / snang ba'i mdo dang / 'jug pa'i mdo'o //
translated: the sutra of the basis, the sutra of the focus, the sutra of appearances, and the sutra of engagement.

original: de yang 'di ltar /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar /
translated: They are as follows:🔽The four sutras are explained according to the basis, the focus,

original: mdo bzhi gzhi dang dmigs pa dang // snang dang 'jug pa lung bzhin bshad //
analyzed: mdo bzhi gzhi dang dmigs pa dang // snang dang 'jug pa lung bzhin bshad //
translated: appearances, and engagement.

original: lang ka'i bdag po; de la gzhi'i mdo ni /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po; de la gzhi'i mdo ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: Lord of Lanka, the sutra of the basis is as follows:

original: gzhi ni byis pa 'di ltar 'dod //
analyzed: gzhi ni byis pa 'di ltar 'dod //
translated: The basis is asserted by the childish

original: gzugs med ming la mngon zhen pa //
analyzed: gzugs med ming la mngon zhen pa //
translated: to be the form that is attached to in the formless realm.

original: med pa'i khams nyid de kho na //
analyzed: med pa'i khams nyid de kho na //
translated: The formless realm itself is the only reality.

original: shes pa kun gyi ngo bor 'byung //
analyzed: shes pa kun gyi ngo bor 'byung //
translated: It arises as the essence of all consciousness.

original: shes bya nyid de yul du snang //
analyzed: shes bya nyid de yul du snang //
translated: The object of consciousness itself appears as an object.

original: thams cad 'byung par byed pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: thams cad 'byung par byed pa'i rgyu //
translated: It is the cause that creates everything.

original: ye nas ngang gis ma skyes la //
analyzed: ye nas ngang gis ma skyes la //
translated: It is primordially and naturally unborn.

original: ma bcos yong gis 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: ma bcos yong gis 'od gsal ba //
translated: It is unfabricated, luminous by nature.

original: rgyu rkyen med pas 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen med pas 'dus ma byas //
translated: It is unconditioned, since it is not produced by causes and conditions.

original: yongs su ma chad yul kun la //
analyzed: yongs su ma chad yul kun la //
translated: It is not divided, but is the object of all.

original: shes la mi gsal lhan cig 'byung //
analyzed: shes la mi gsal lhan cig 'byung //
translated: It is not clear to the consciousness, but arises together with it.

original: khyab 'jug btang snyoms dngos med nyid //
analyzed: khyab 'jug btang snyoms dngos med nyid //
translated: It is the indifference of Viṣṇu, and is not a thing.

original: rnam par mi rtog dpyod dang bral //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog dpyod dang bral //
translated: It is nonconceptual, free from analysis.

original: mi rtog de yi de nyid la //
analyzed: mi rtog de yi de nyid la //
translated: The reality of that nonconceptuality

original: skad cig snga phyi ji snyed pa //
analyzed: skad cig snga phyi ji snyed pa //
translated: Is as many as the moments of the past and future.

original: rgyun dang bcas pa'i chu bo bzhin //
analyzed: rgyun dang bcas pa'i chu bo bzhin //
translated: It is like the four rivers with their currents.

original: rgyun 'byung skye 'gag bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun 'byung skye 'gag bcas pa'o //
translated: It arises in a continuum, with birth and cessation.

original: gcig tu chad pa med pa yi //
analyzed: gcig tu chad pa med pa yi //
translated: It is not interrupted in any way.

original: so so ris ltar mi snang ba //
analyzed: so so ris ltar mi snang ba //
translated: It does not appear as individual parts.

original: bye brag rnam par 'byed pa ni //
analyzed: bye brag rnam par 'byed pa ni //
translated: The analysis of the distinctions

original: 'di dang 'di zhes ga la yod //
analyzed: 'di dang 'di zhes ga la yod //
translated: Is “this” and “that.” How could it be?

original: tha snyad gnyis kyi bsdus pa'i chos //🔽thams cad thams cad pa nyid de //
analyzed: tha snyad gnyis kyi bsdus pa'i chos // thams cad thams cad pa nyid de //
translated: All phenomena included in the two conventions🔽Are all-pervading.

original: kun 'gro kun 'jug kun la sbyor //
analyzed: kun 'gro kun 'jug kun la sbyor //
translated: They are omnipresent, all-pervading, and connected to all.

original: dngos rig @329a *//
analyzed: dngos rig @329a *//
translated: They are the knower of things.

original: sna tshogs dbyer mi rig /🔽g-yo ba nyid dang rnam par bkod //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbyer mi rig / g-yo ba nyid dang rnam par bkod //
translated: They are the various distinctions.🔽They are the movements and the arrangements.

original: yongs myong gcod dang de 'dzin byed //
analyzed: yongs myong gcod dang de 'dzin byed //
translated: They are the complete experiences, the divisions, and the holders of those.

original: lnga ldan mdun du ldan pa la //
analyzed: lnga ldan mdun du ldan pa la //
translated: The fivefold is in front of the possessor.

original: de ni kun tu snyoms pa yin //
analyzed: de ni kun tu snyoms pa yin //
translated: That is the universal.

original: gang zhen de 'dzin kun mi gtong //
analyzed: gang zhen de 'dzin kun mi gtong //
translated: What is clung to is not relinquished.

original: go skabs yod pa'i nam mkha' ltar //
analyzed: go skabs yod pa'i nam mkha' ltar //
translated: Like space, which is an opportunity,

original: chos kun gnas 'byung go yod pa //
analyzed: chos kun gnas 'byung go yod pa //
translated: all phenomena exist in the opportunity of arising.

original: skyed smin sog dang len pa yin //
analyzed: skyed smin sog dang len pa yin //
translated: It is the field that generates and ripens.

original: rkyen ni gnyis dang mi ldan te //
analyzed: rkyen ni gnyis dang mi ldan te //
translated: Conditions are not endowed with two.

original: ma nges de nyid kho na la //🔽thams cad du ni gnas pa yin //
analyzed: ma nges de nyid kho na la // thams cad du ni gnas pa yin //
translated: The uncertain one exists in reality.

original: rkyen ni gang phrad de nyid du'o //
analyzed: rkyen ni gang phrad de nyid du'o //
translated: Conditions are met in that reality.

original: chos rnams rtsa bar gcig pa la //
analyzed: chos rnams rtsa bar gcig pa la //
translated: The one root of all phenomena

original: de rgyun dbang gi rnam par gnyis //
analyzed: de rgyun dbang gi rnam par gnyis //
translated: is twofold, the continuum and power.

original: gzhi dang rten zhes grags pa la //
analyzed: gzhi dang rten zhes grags pa la //
translated: The basis and support are renowned

original: rmongs dang shes pa'i khyad par snang //
analyzed: rmongs dang shes pa'i khyad par snang //
translated: as the appearances of the difference between delusion and knowledge.

original: gzhi la kun 'gro kun la rmongs //
analyzed: gzhi la kun 'gro kun la rmongs //
translated: In the basis, there is delusion in all,

original: rnam pa zhen pa'i bsti gnas med //
analyzed: rnam pa zhen pa'i bsti gnas med //
translated: but there is no basis for clinging to aspects.🔽The four conditions are the appearance of the union,

original: rkyen ni bzhi sbyor snang ba dang // 'gyur med rnam dag btsal med gnas //
analyzed: rkyen ni bzhi sbyor snang ba dang // 'gyur med rnam dag btsal med gnas //
translated: the unchanging, the effortless, and the abode.

original: de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis //
analyzed: de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis //
translated: Those are the two, cause and result.

original: snga ma snga ma gang dag gang //
analyzed: snga ma snga ma gang dag gang //
translated: Whatever they are, they are earlier and later.

original: phyi ma phyi ma smin pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma smin pa'i rgyu //
translated: The later ones are the ripening causes.

original: de bzhin kun du 'khor bar 'byung //
analyzed: de bzhin kun du 'khor bar 'byung //
translated: Thus, they arise in the wheel of existence.

original: rten lnga de rgyun de dbang gis //
analyzed: rten lnga de rgyun de dbang gis //
translated: The five supports are due to the continuity of that.

original: rnal 'byor lngar snang gnyen po lnga //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lngar snang gnyen po lnga //
translated: The five appearances of yoga are the five antidotes.

original: smin pa'i dpe lnga sbyor dpe bzhin //
analyzed: smin pa'i dpe lnga sbyor dpe bzhin //
translated: The five examples of ripening are like the examples of union.

original: skabs lnga lam lnga de bzhin sa //
analyzed: skabs lnga lam lnga de bzhin sa //
translated: The five topics and the five paths are the same.🔽The five sets of five are the five abodes, the five times,

original: lnga lnga ba sti gnas dus lnga dang // gnas lnga mthar phyin rnam bya lnga //
analyzed: lnga lnga ba sti gnas dus lnga dang // gnas lnga mthar phyin rnam bya lnga //
translated: the five places, and the five perfections.

original: 'dir dbye ba las lnga bcu drug /
analyzed: 'dir dbye ba las lnga bcu drug /
translated: Here, there are fifty-six divisions.

original: rdzogs par snang pas lngar bshad do //
analyzed: rdzogs par snang pas lngar bshad do //
translated: Since they appear completely, they are explained as five.

original: ches rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur @329b pas; ;nor ba'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba snang //
analyzed: ches rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur @329b pas; ;nor ba'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba snang //
translated: Since it is the basis of all phenomena, samsāra appears due to the condition of error.

original: rang bzhin ji ltar yin pa'i don //
analyzed: rang bzhin ji ltar yin pa'i don //
translated: If the meaning of the way things are is

original: nges par mthong na mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: nges par mthong na mya ngan 'das //
translated: seen, it is nirvāṇa.

original: kun gyi gzhi dang gang de shes //
analyzed: kun gyi gzhi dang gang de shes //
translated: Whoever knows that basis of all

original: chos kyi phung po srid gsum 'byung //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po srid gsum 'byung //
translated: is the aggregate of phenomena that arises in the three existences.

original: de byung rtsa ba sna tshogs len //
analyzed: de byung rtsa ba sna tshogs len //
translated: The source of that is the various appropriators,

original: dbyings dang 'byung gnas rgyu zhes grags //
analyzed: dbyings dang 'byung gnas rgyu zhes grags //
translated: known as the dhātu, the source, and the cause.

original: stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med //
translated: It is emptiness and without characteristics.

original: de bzhin nyid de ma nor ba //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ma nor ba //
translated: That suchness is unerring,

original: ma bcos gzhan ma yin pa nyid //
analyzed: ma bcos gzhan ma yin pa nyid //
translated: unfabricated, and not other.

original: ting 'dzin rtog pa stong nyid grags //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rtog pa stong nyid grags //
translated: Concentration is known as emptiness of concepts.

original: lhag mthong zhi gnas rnam par thar //
analyzed: lhag mthong zhi gnas rnam par thar //
translated: Insight is the liberation of śamatha.

original: dbu ma mtha' bral gzung ba med //🔽'dzin med chad med rtag pa med //
analyzed: dbu ma mtha' bral gzung ba med // 'dzin med chad med rtag pa med //
translated: The middle is free from extremes, without apprehended objects.🔽It is without apprehender, without annihilation, and without permanence.

original: skye med 'gag med rtog pa med //
analyzed: skye med 'gag med rtog pa med //
translated: It is unborn, unceasing, and without concepts.

original: rnam par rtog med mtshan ma med //
analyzed: rnam par rtog med mtshan ma med //
translated: It is nonconceptual and without characteristics.

original: de bzhin bdag med gzhan med pa //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag med gzhan med pa //
translated: Likewise, it is without self and without other.

original: 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med //
analyzed: 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med //
translated: It is without going and without coming.

original: dri med 'du ba 'bral ba med //
analyzed: dri med 'du ba 'bral ba med //
translated: It is stainless, without meeting or parting.

original: phung med khams med skye mched med //
analyzed: phung med khams med skye mched med //
translated: It is without aggregates, without elements, and without sense sources.

original: yul med las med rgyu 'bras med //
analyzed: yul med las med rgyu 'bras med //
translated: It is without objects, without actions, and without causes or results.

original: ma skyes snying po byang chub med //
analyzed: ma skyes snying po byang chub med //
translated: It is unborn, without the essence of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems //
translated: Buddhas, the dharma, and bodhisattvas

original: de ni mi skye mi 'gag la //
analyzed: de ni mi skye mi 'gag la //
translated: are unborn and unceasing.

original: de ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: They are like space.

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid chos kyi sku //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid chos kyi sku //
translated: The dharmadhātu itself is the dharmakāya,

original: mi rtog ye shes yin zhes grags //
analyzed: mi rtog ye shes yin zhes grags //
translated: known as nonconceptual wisdom.

original: ma byung ye nas rang bzhin snang //
analyzed: ma byung ye nas rang bzhin snang //
translated: It is unarisen, primordially manifest by nature.

original: ji srid len pa'i srid pa dag /
analyzed: ji srid len pa'i srid pa dag /
translated: As long as there is the existence of grasping,

original: gang sangs gang dag byung 'gags pas //
analyzed: gang sangs gang dag byung 'gags pas //
translated: The suffering of those who have been born and those who have not yet been born

original: sdug bsngal de rgyun zad bsregs pas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal de rgyun zad bsregs pas //
translated: is exhausted and burned up by the stream.

original: 'gyur ba'i skabs lngas nges par 'byung //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i skabs lngas nges par 'byung //
translated: There is definite emergence through five topics.

original: gzugs med mthong med yod ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs med mthong med yod ma yin //
translated: Formless things are not seen and do not exist.

original: yod pas mthong ba'i yul du gyur //🔽mthong med yul @330a *//
analyzed: yod pas mthong ba'i yul du gyur // mthong med yul @330a *//
translated: Because they exist, they become the object of seeing.

original: du ma gyur pa //
analyzed: du ma gyur pa //
translated: If they are not seen, they do not become the object.

original: yod ces bya bar ga la rigs //
analyzed: yod ces bya bar ga la rigs //
translated: How can it be logical to say that they exist?

original: mu mtha' med par 'byung ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: mu mtha' med par 'byung ba'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of arising without end

original: dngos med gzhi rten ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: dngos med gzhi rten ngo bo nyid //
translated: is the basis of nonentity, the essence.

original: de bas tha dad sna tshogs snang //
analyzed: de bas tha dad sna tshogs snang //
translated: Therefore, the various appearances are different.

original: dbyings 'di med na kun dang 'gal //
analyzed: dbyings 'di med na kun dang 'gal //
translated: If this dhātu did not exist, everything would be contradictory.

original: gal te med pa gcig yod na //
analyzed: gal te med pa gcig yod na //
translated: If a single nonexistence existed,

original: 'dzin pa phyogs kyang de lta bas //
analyzed: 'dzin pa phyogs kyang de lta bas //
translated: even though one were to grasp it, it would be like that.

original: nams kyang grol bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: nams kyang grol bar mi 'gyur te //
translated: One would never be liberated,

original: 'ching ba'i mdud pa de na yod //
analyzed: 'ching ba'i mdud pa de na yod //
translated: because the knot of bondage would exist.

original: gang zhig mur 'dzin mthar lta ba //
analyzed: gang zhig mur 'dzin mthar lta ba //
translated: Whoever grasps an extreme and views an extreme

original: des ni mu med don ma mthong //
analyzed: des ni mu med don ma mthong //
translated: does not see the meaning of the extreme of nonexistence.

original: mur 'dzin mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra //
analyzed: mur 'dzin mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra //
translated: Grasping an extreme is like measuring the height of space.

original: mu med nyid la grol bar bshad //
analyzed: mu med nyid la grol bar bshad //
translated: Liberation is explained as being in the extreme of nonexistence.

original: mur 'dzin grol 'dod grol ma yin //
analyzed: mur 'dzin grol 'dod grol ma yin //
translated: Those who wish to be liberated from grasping an extreme are not liberated.

original: byed ma skyed kyang 'brur mi smin //🔽shel sgong bsgyur yang gting mi 'gyur //
analyzed: byed ma skyed kyang 'brur mi smin // shel sgong bsgyur yang gting mi 'gyur //
translated: Even if you try to make it, the grain will not ripen.🔽Even if you try to change a crystal egg, the inside will not change.

original: 'ching bu bsgyur yang rin chen min //
analyzed: 'ching bu bsgyur yang rin chen min //
translated: Even if you try to change a stone, it will not become a jewel.

original: sa rdo bsres kyang 'drer mi rung //
analyzed: sa rdo bsres kyang 'drer mi rung //
translated: Even if you mix earth and stone, they will not become gold.

original: glog 'gyus gzhi la mun pa med //
analyzed: glog 'gyus gzhi la mun pa med //
translated: In the basis of the flickering lightning, there is no darkness.

original: mtshal ze gser zhun gcig mi srid //
analyzed: mtshal ze gser zhun gcig mi srid //
translated: It is impossible for a vermilion seed to be gold.

original: skyes bus nyid la mchod mi srid //
analyzed: skyes bus nyid la mchod mi srid //
translated: It is impossible for a person to make an offering to himself.

original: chu bo snga phyi rgyun mi 'phrad //
analyzed: chu bo snga phyi rgyun mi 'phrad //
translated: The earlier and later streams of a river do not meet.

original: chos mthun pa na rigs mtha' yas //
analyzed: chos mthun pa na rigs mtha' yas //
translated: When there is concordant dharma, the end of the family is infinite.

original: des na de bzhin nyid ces bsngags //
analyzed: des na de bzhin nyid ces bsngags //
translated: Therefore, it is praised as suchness.

original: de nyid med na thams cad du //
analyzed: de nyid med na thams cad du //
translated: If that were not so,

original: gang de len yod ga la srid //
analyzed: gang de len yod ga la srid //
translated: how could it be possible for anything to be appropriated?

original: de nyid med na rgyun bkag nas //
analyzed: de nyid med na rgyun bkag nas //
translated: If that were not so, having stopped the continuum,🔽after how long would it arise again?

original: ji srid cig na slar ldang ba; ;gang las byung de gang las min //
analyzed: ji srid cig na slar ldang ba; ;gang las byung de gang las min //
translated: From what would it arise? From what would it not?

original: gang med de med gnyis med na //
analyzed: gang med de med gnyis med na //

analyzed: de la snang ba'i mdo gang zhe na /

analyzed: thams cad de 'jug byed pa yin //

analyzed: lang ka'i bdag po /

analyzed: rtags dang gang 'dir sangs pa dang // gang de blong bas kun dkris zad //

original: gza' gtad rkyen gyis de 'joms dang // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gza' gtad rkyen gyis de 'joms dang // gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'o //

original: thang cig 'gags dang de sangs pa //
analyzed: thang cig 'gags dang de sangs pa //

original: de yang der 'jug de nyid do //

original: gnyis pa gnyis byed la 'jug pa //
analyzed: gnyis pa gnyis byed la 'jug pa //

analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba g-yo bar byed //

original: bzhi pa chags pas nyams gyur pa //
analyzed: bzhi pa chags pas nyams gyur pa //

original: rmongs pa'i lta bas brtan par gnas //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i lta bas brtan par gnas //

analyzed: gang 'dir goms pa chung ba dang // rnam pa rtags dang mtshan ma dang // de byed yid nyams sogs 'gyur bas //

original: yang dag blangs te der 'jug dang // @333a *//
analyzed: yang dag blangs te der 'jug dang // @333a *//

analyzed: sgribs dang gzhan gyis zin pa'o //

analyzed: lnga pa don rgyud chad byed pa //

translated: The condition of karma is not abandoning fear.🔽The condition of karma

analyzed: don de gang ldan gar 'gro ba //

original: sngon du de bsten de dran nas //
analyzed: sngon du de bsten de dran nas //

analyzed: gzhan gyis gsal bar byas kyang ni //

analyzed: bskul yang @333b dran par //

analyzed: de dang gang ldan bde 'gro ste //

analyzed: de yi de kun shes pa des //

analyzed: gzhan gyis gsal bar ma byas pa'o //

analyzed: gnyis su mi gsal btang snyoms so // 'di dag gang ldan gang 'gro @334a *//

analyzed: goms pa la gzhol de stobs ldan //

analyzed: ma zhen dbang gis 'gag par 'gyur //

analyzed: gang de gnyis la mtshungs goms na //

analyzed: der ni dang por gang gsal lam //

analyzed: gzhan gyis gsal bar byas pa las //

analyzed: log par mi 'gyur gzhan mi 'jug /

analyzed: btang snyoms kha cig 'gyur ba yin //

analyzed: kha cig mi 'gyur rdzogs mi 'byung //

original: thams cad kyang ni 'pho ba'i tshe //
analyzed: thams cad kyang ni 'pho ba'i tshe //

analyzed: skabs su ma bab par dag tu //

analyzed: yun rings dus na goms pa yi //

analyzed: gang la gang chags de 'byung ngo //

analyzed: de las de yi de dbang gis //

analyzed: 'dir de med par 'gyur shes nas //

analyzed: de 'di nyid la zhe sdang skye //

original: de yi dus na rnal 'byor pa //
analyzed: de yi dus na rnal 'byor pa //
translated: At that time, the yogi

analyzed: de bzhin de la goms ched tshe //

original: de tshe chags pa 'byung mod kyi //
analyzed: de tshe chags pa 'byung mod kyi //

original: goms par gyur pa'i don stobs kyis //
analyzed: goms par gyur pa'i don stobs kyis //

original: chags pa de zil gnon pa ni //
analyzed: chags pa de zil gnon pa ni //

original: mi gang rtsal dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: mi gang rtsal dang ldan pa yis //

original: shugs med gang dag gnon bzhin no //
analyzed: shugs med gang dag gnon bzhin no //
translated: Overcomes the powerless.

original: byang chub rig 'dzin rnal 'byor la //
analyzed: byang chub rig 'dzin rnal 'byor la //

original: gang chags de @334b 'byung mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang chags de @334b 'byung mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That attachment will not arise.

original: gnad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i //🔽gang la mthon dman ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: gnad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i // gang la mthon dman ma gtogs pa //
translated: The unbearable pain of the vital points🔽Arises for everyone except

analyzed: gzhan dag kun la 'byung ba yin //

original: shin tu nyen dga' med phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu nyen dga' med phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not very sensitive.🔽There are only two kinds of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal che chung gnyis kho na //
analyzed: sdug bsngal che chung gnyis kho na //

original: gang 'gags gcig dang rims kyis 'gags //
analyzed: gang 'gags gcig dang rims kyis 'gags //

original: de nyid goms te gang ma 'gags //
analyzed: de nyid goms te gang ma 'gags //

original: gtso bas de la der zhen gces //
analyzed: gtso bas de la der zhen gces //
translated: The chief one is attached to that.

original: gsum pa srid gsum bar bdun pa //
analyzed: gsum pa srid gsum bar bdun pa //
translated: The third is the seven in the three existences.

original: brdzus skye dbang ldan las kyi 'gro //
analyzed: brdzus skye dbang ldan las kyi 'gro //
translated: The miraculous birth is the powerful karma of migration.

original: gang mthun mthong yin gang mthong min //
analyzed: gang mthun mthong yin gang mthong min //
translated: What is compatible is seen, what is not seen is not.

original: shin tu bde dang bde sdug bsngal //
analyzed: shin tu bde dang bde sdug bsngal //
translated: Very happy, happy, and suffering,

original: de sogs gang du skye 'gyur de'i //
analyzed: de sogs gang du skye 'gyur de'i //
translated: and so forth, wherever one is born,

original: de dbyibs 'dzin cing thogs pa med //
analyzed: de dbyibs 'dzin cing thogs pa med //
translated: that shape is grasped and unobstructed.

original: de yi lus sam spyod yul ni //
analyzed: de yi lus sam spyod yul ni //
translated: That body or field of experience

original: dri ma can du gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: dri ma can du gyur pa rnams //
translated: becomes defiled.

original: mtshan mo mun nag rdzas nag ltar //
analyzed: mtshan mo mun nag rdzas nag ltar //
translated: Like night, darkness, and black substances,

original: thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: everything is seen in everything.

original: gang dag dri med pa dag rnams //
analyzed: gang dag dri med pa dag rnams //
translated: Those that are stainless

original: zla 'od dkar dang rdzas dkar ltar //
analyzed: zla 'od dkar dang rdzas dkar ltar //
translated: are like the white light of the moon and white substances.

original: de gnyis de mig dag pas mthong //
analyzed: de gnyis de mig dag pas mthong //
translated: Those two are seen by the pure eye of that.

original: gang de'i de tshad tha ma pa'i //
analyzed: gang de'i de tshad tha ma pa'i //
translated: That is the final measure of that.

original: sprul pa 'byung gnas lnga tshad par //
analyzed: sprul pa 'byung gnas lnga tshad par //
translated: The five measures are the source of emanations.

original: gang skye gnas ma blangs bar du //
analyzed: gang skye gnas ma blangs bar du //
translated: Until the birthplace is taken,

original: de mig de yi mig lta bur //
analyzed: de mig de yi mig lta bur //
translated: that eye is like the eye of that.

original: gang las thogs med skal mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: gang las thogs med skal mnyam pa'o //
translated: The place where it will be born is not obstructed.

original: gang ltar kun la ma yin no //
analyzed: gang ltar kun la ma yin no //
translated: It is not everywhere.🔽It sees the place of its birth and its parents in union.🔽If it is to be born from a womb, it sees a place that is covered and concealed.

original: gang skal mnyam pa'i skye gnas dang // de dag nyid gnas mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang skal mnyam pa'i skye gnas dang // de dag nyid gnas mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: If it is to be born from an egg, it sees a place that is open and exposed.

original: gang dag dri mig thur du gsal //
analyzed: gang dag dri mig thur du gsal //
translated: If it is to be born from moisture, it sees a place that is wet.

original: spyi tshugs 'gro la gzhan mthong min //
analyzed: spyi tshugs 'gro la gzhan mthong min //
translated: If it is to be born from spontaneous birth, it sees a place that is clean and pure.🔽If it is to be born as a male, it will want to have intercourse with the mother and fight with the father.🔽If it is to be born as a female, it will want to have intercourse with the father and fight with the mother.🔽If it is to be born as a neuter, it will want to have intercourse with both of them and fight with both of them.

original: dri med mthor gsal gzhan de bzhin //
analyzed: dri med mthor gsal gzhan de bzhin //
translated: If it is to be born as a being of great merit, it will see a place that is bright and pure.

original: gang gi thad du de nyid snang //
analyzed: gang gi thad du de nyid snang //
translated: If it is to be born as a being of little merit, it will see a place that is dark and gloomy.

original: @335a *// gzhan ni gong ma nyid bzhin no //🔽bar bdun pa yi snying po can //
analyzed: @335a *// gzhan ni gong ma nyid bzhin no // bar bdun pa yi snying po can //
translated: If it is to be born into a high caste, it will see itself as superior to its parents.🔽If it is to be born into a low caste, it will see itself as inferior to its parents.🔽If it is to be born into a family of great wealth, it will see itself as very wealthy.

original: skye ba de ma rnyed bar du //🔽ring ltar thogs na bdun pa'o //🔽gang de ldan na nges med de; ;gcig gam gnyis sam gsum na 'pho //
analyzed: skye ba de ma rnyed bar du // ring ltar thogs na bdun pa'o // gang de ldan na nges med de; ;gcig gam gnyis sam gsum na 'pho //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of little wealth, it will see itself as very poor.🔽If it is to be born into a family of great merit, it will see itself as very beautiful.

original: gang ma ldan na de rjes nas //
analyzed: gang ma ldan na de rjes nas //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of little merit, it will see itself as very ugly.

original: yang bdun bar du de na gnas //
analyzed: yang bdun bar du de na gnas //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of great wisdom, it will see itself as very wise.

original: gang yod de gang mi ldan na //🔽bdun phrag bdun gyi bar dag tu //
analyzed: gang yod de gang mi ldan na // bdun phrag bdun gyi bar dag tu //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of little wisdom, it will see itself as very foolish.

original: bdun nyid re na de brje zhing //
analyzed: bdun nyid re na de brje zhing //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of great compassion, it will see itself as very compassionate.🔽If it is to be born into a family of little compassion, it will see itself as very cruel.

original: de rdzogs srid du de na gnas //
analyzed: de rdzogs srid du de na gnas //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of great faith, it will see itself as very faithful.

original: des ni gnas pa de zad nas //
analyzed: des ni gnas pa de zad nas //
translated: If it is to be born into a family of little faith, it will see itself as very faithless.🔽If it is to

original: gzhan du gnas pa de 'dzin pa'i //
analyzed: gzhan du gnas pa de 'dzin pa'i //
translated: The other abides in the intermediate state,

original: gang de ji srid zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: gang de ji srid zil gyis gnon //
translated: and is overcome by that for as long as it lasts.

original: bdun nyid bdun rdzogs de phyin chad //
analyzed: bdun nyid bdun rdzogs de phyin chad //
translated: For seven days, and then after that,

original: nges par de med ga la srid //
analyzed: nges par de med ga la srid //
translated: how could it be that it does not definitely not exist?

original: gang nub gang snang de skabs na //
analyzed: gang nub gang snang de skabs na //
translated: When one set [of aggregates] sets, and another appears,

original: skad cig gnas pas bar ma do //
analyzed: skad cig gnas pas bar ma do //
translated: it is the intermediate state, abiding for an instant.

original: bdun zhing nub pa'i rang bzhin pas //
analyzed: bdun zhing nub pa'i rang bzhin pas //
translated: Since it sets after seven [days],

original: nub pa'i srid pa zhes kyang bshad //
analyzed: nub pa'i srid pa zhes kyang bshad //
translated: it is also explained as the setting existence.

original: bdun pa'i bar du gnas pas na //
analyzed: bdun pa'i bar du gnas pas na //
translated: Since it abides for seven [days],

original: gang de bar bdun pa zhes bya //
analyzed: gang de bar bdun pa zhes bya //
translated: that is called the seven-day [existence].

original: dri yi phyir 'brang dri rta bas //
analyzed: dri yi phyir 'brang dri rta bas //
translated: It is called gandharva because it follows smell,

original: dri za nyer 'gro zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: dri za nyer 'gro zhes kyang bya //
translated: and it is called “approaching smell” [too].

original: de la brten nas de byung bas //
analyzed: de la brten nas de byung bas //
translated: Since it arises in dependence on that,

original: de las byung ba zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: de las byung ba zhes kyang bya //
translated: it is also called “arisen from that.”

original: skye ba'i dbyibs tshugs de 'dzin pas //
analyzed: skye ba'i dbyibs tshugs de 'dzin pas //
translated: Since it takes on the shape and posture of the birth [existence],

original: sngon dang phyi ma'i tshul bzhin can //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi ma'i tshul bzhin can //
translated: it has the same manner as before and after.

original: skye ba mngon du byed pas na //
analyzed: skye ba mngon du byed pas na //
translated: Since it manifests the birth [existence],

original: mngon du grub pa zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: mngon du grub pa zhes kyang bya //
translated: it is also called “manifested existence.”

original: rtag tu zas la nye 'khor bas //
analyzed: rtag tu zas la nye 'khor bas //
translated: Since it is always near to food,

original: nye bar 'khor ba zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: nye bar 'khor ba zhes kyang bya //
translated: it is also called “near-to-food.”

original: gnyis kyi bar skabs yin pas na //
analyzed: gnyis kyi bar skabs yin pas na //
translated: Because it is in between two states,

original: srid pa mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya //
analyzed: srid pa mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya //
translated: it is called the “linking of existence.”

original: de ni gzugs can yin pas na //
analyzed: de ni gzugs can yin pas na //
translated: Since it has form,

original: gzugs med pa yi @335b gnas med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa yi @335b gnas med do //
translated: it does not exist in the formless realm.

original: de na gnas pa'i srid pa de //
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i srid pa de //
translated: The existence that abides there

original: sngar 'gags pa yi srid pa la //
analyzed: sngar 'gags pa yi srid pa la //
translated: is the existence that has ceased before.

original: de dang de min btang snyoms pa //
analyzed: de dang de min btang snyoms pa //
translated: It is indifferent to that and to this.

original: gsum la chags sdang zhen goms pas //
analyzed: gsum la chags sdang zhen goms pas //
translated: Through habituation to attachment and aversion to the three,

original: gang sngon gang la zhen pa bzhin /
analyzed: gang sngon gang la zhen pa bzhin /
translated: just as one was previously attached to something,

original: dus der de la mngon par dga'//
analyzed: dus der de la mngon par dga'//
translated: at that time one delights in it.

original: sngon tshe legs nyes spyad pa'i yul //
analyzed: sngon tshe legs nyes spyad pa'i yul //
translated: The object of the good and bad conduct in previous lives

original: klung du gang gyur de nyid snang //
analyzed: klung du gang gyur de nyid snang //
translated: appears just as it was.

original: de dag rmi lam bzhin mthong bas //
analyzed: de dag rmi lam bzhin mthong bas //
translated: Seeing them as in a dream,

original: mthong nyid yul du mngon par gyur //
analyzed: mthong nyid yul du mngon par gyur //
translated: the object appears as if seen.

original: de tshe 'khrul pa'i gzugs mthong ltar //
analyzed: de tshe 'khrul pa'i gzugs mthong ltar //
translated: Just as one sees a form in a delusion,

original: gang gis snga ltas 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis snga ltas 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: there are signs of what will happen.

original: bde rkyen mi ldan pa zhig na //
analyzed: bde rkyen mi ldan pa zhig na //
translated: If the conditions for happiness are not present,

original: de na gnas dang de nub na //
analyzed: de na gnas dang de nub na //
translated: then one abides there and sinks into it.

original: dman par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas ni //
analyzed: dman par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas ni //
translated: The signs of becoming inferior

original: srog chags ldem bu la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: srog chags ldem bu la sogs pa'i //
translated: are such things as worms and so on.

original: gang du byung ba'i rigs mthun mthong //🔽ca co'i sgra dang 'dam bu'i thibs //
analyzed: gang du byung ba'i rigs mthun mthong // ca co'i sgra dang 'dam bu'i thibs //
translated: And sees the corresponding type of place where it will be born.🔽If it is to be born from a womb, it sees a man and a woman united in passion,

original: nags tshal thibs po la sogs pa //🔽ldum bu'i tshal dang dri sna tshogs //
analyzed: nags tshal thibs po la sogs pa // ldum bu'i tshal dang dri sna tshogs //
translated: And if it is to be born in a thicket, a forest, or the like,🔽It sees a thicket of reeds or various kinds of trees,

original: khang bzang rdzing dang 'khrigs sprin gyis //🔽nang du 'jug pa'i mtshan ma 'byung //
analyzed: khang bzang rdzing dang 'khrigs sprin gyis // nang du 'jug pa'i mtshan ma 'byung //
translated: A fine house, a pond, or a cloud.

original: gang 'dir dag pa bzhig na //
analyzed: gang 'dir dag pa bzhig na //
translated: If it is to be born in a pure place,

original: rigs mthong gyur ba'i snga ltas na //
analyzed: rigs mthong gyur ba'i snga ltas na //
translated: The signs of the type of place it will be born in are as follows:

original: zhi ba'i yul dang snyan pa'i sgra //
analyzed: zhi ba'i yul dang snyan pa'i sgra //
translated: A peaceful country, a pleasant sound,🔽A beautiful object, a pleasant smell,

original: yid 'ong dbang po tshem pa dang // khang bzang dang ni gzhal med khang //🔽skyed mos tshal dang snang yul du //
analyzed: yid 'ong dbang po tshem pa dang // khang bzang dang ni gzhal med khang // skyed mos tshal dang snang yul du //
translated: A delicious taste, and a soft touch🔽Are the signs of a pure place.

original: 'byung ba'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur //🔽'khor los bsgyur rgyal la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i mtshan ma snang bar 'gyur // 'khor los bsgyur rgyal la sogs pa'i //
translated: If it is to be born in a pure place,

original: dag pas dag pa de rigs mthong //
analyzed: dag pas dag pa de rigs mthong //
translated: It sees the pure type of place, such as a universal monarch’s.

original: de na gnas pa'i snying po de //
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i snying po de //
translated: The essence of the being in the intermediate state🔽Is attached to the place where it will be born,

original: 'dod la zhen pas zhen pa'i phyir //🔽gang du dri byung der 'brangs pas //
analyzed: 'dod la zhen pas zhen pa'i phyir // gang du dri byung der 'brangs pas //
translated: Because of attachment to the objects of desire.🔽Wherever a smell arises, it follows it,🔽And wherever the smell of feces arises,

original: nga dang mi nga dri 'byung yul //
analyzed: nga dang mi nga dri 'byung yul //
translated: It is born there.

original: @336a *// de la zhen pas tshim 'gyur te //
analyzed: @336a *// de la zhen pas tshim 'gyur te //
translated: By clinging to that, there is satisfaction.

original: 'khrigs pas de la zhe sdang 'byung //
analyzed: 'khrigs pas de la zhe sdang 'byung //
translated: By being filled with that, there is anger.

original: des ni bar bdun rgyun 'gags byed //
analyzed: des ni bar bdun rgyun 'gags byed //
translated: That causes the seven lower rebirths to cease.

original: de zhen bar bdun de zad nas //🔽des ni de nyid de rtas te //
analyzed: de zhen bar bdun de zad nas // des ni de nyid de rtas te //
translated: Clinging to that, the seven lower rebirths are exhausted.🔽That causes the essence of that to increase.

original: gang du rtas pa'i snying po las //
analyzed: gang du rtas pa'i snying po las //
translated: From the essence that increases,

original: sogs pa'i lus can tha dad snang //
analyzed: sogs pa'i lus can tha dad snang //
translated: the various bodies of beings appear.

original: drod rkyen rlan rnams de rigs 'dzin //
analyzed: drod rkyen rlan rnams de rigs 'dzin //
translated: Heat, conditions, and moisture hold that type.

original: de med khams su de mi 'byung //
analyzed: de med khams su de mi 'byung //
translated: Without that, it does not occur in the elements.

original: de med ma yin mkha' rdul 'dra //
analyzed: de med ma yin mkha' rdul 'dra //
translated: It is not nonexistent, like space particles.

original: gang de ldan pa'i yul rnams ni //
analyzed: gang de ldan pa'i yul rnams ni //
translated: The places that possess that

original: dpag par gang ni ring gyur kyang //
analyzed: dpag par gang ni ring gyur kyang //
translated: are far away, no matter how far they are

original: thogs med mig ris mthong tshor phyin //
analyzed: thogs med mig ris mthong tshor phyin //
translated: because the unobstructed eye can see and feel them.

original: gang gi dbang gis de 'gro bas //
analyzed: gang gi dbang gis de 'gro bas //
translated: By whose power do they go?

original: rig pa nyid na phyin pa yin //
analyzed: rig pa nyid na phyin pa yin //
translated: When there is vidyā, it has gone.

original: de la de ring tha snyad med //
analyzed: de la de ring tha snyad med //
translated: There is no convention of that today.

original: ci phyir khyab 'jug gdos med de //
analyzed: ci phyir khyab 'jug gdos med de //
translated: Why? Viṣṇu is not substantial;

original: lus can rnams kyi spyod yul min //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi spyod yul min //
translated: he is not an object of experience for embodied beings.

original: la la gang la zhen pa'i mthus //
analyzed: la la gang la zhen pa'i mthus //
translated: By the power of clinging to some,

original: mthun par snang ba'i rigs can dag /
analyzed: mthun par snang ba'i rigs can dag /
translated: those of a similar type appear in harmony.

original: gang du 'phrod byed mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang du 'phrod byed mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: Where will the one who is to be born be seen?

original: de na nyid na der 'khyims nas //
analyzed: de na nyid na der 'khyims nas //
translated: There, right there, he will be caught up in that.

original: de la de 'khor rtog dpyod 'dzin //
analyzed: de la de 'khor rtog dpyod 'dzin //
translated: He will be caught up in that, holding on to thoughts and analysis.🔽Through attachment, the nature of attachment will arise.

original: zhen pas zhen pa'i rang bzhin ldang // gang de'i dbang gis der rmongs nas //
analyzed: zhen pas zhen pa'i rang bzhin ldang // gang de'i dbang gis der rmongs nas //
translated: Through the power of that, he will be confused right there.

original: phyin phyi log tu mthong gyur te //
analyzed: phyin phyi log tu mthong gyur te //
translated: He will see the outside as inside.

original: sgyu ma lta bur 'khrul par snang //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bur 'khrul par snang //
translated: He will appear as an illusion-like confusion.

original: gang du gang zag de 'du 'phrod //
analyzed: gang du gang zag de 'du 'phrod //
translated: Where will that person be caught up?

original: byed par de la de snang gsal //
analyzed: byed par de la de snang gsal //
translated: That will be clear in what appears to him.

original: gal te gnas pa'i cha len na //
analyzed: gal te gnas pa'i cha len na //
translated: If he takes on the aspect of remaining,

original: 'byung la chags pa'i 'dod pa 'byung //
analyzed: 'byung la chags pa'i 'dod pa 'byung //
translated: he will have a desire to be attached to arising.

original: de las bzlog pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa de bzhin te //
translated: The opposite of that is the same.

original: gnas 'gyur gnas dang bral bar 'dod //
analyzed: gnas 'gyur gnas dang bral bar 'dod //
translated: It is asserted that the change of state is free from remaining.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin te //
translated: Arising is the same.

original: gang du mi 'phrod de mthong @336b 'gyur //
analyzed: gang du mi 'phrod de mthong @336b 'gyur //
translated: Where will he see what is not suitable?

original: de la de bzhin de dbang gis //
analyzed: de la de bzhin de dbang gis //
translated: There, in the same way, through the power of that,

original: gnas 'byung mtshan ma 'ba' zhig las //
analyzed: gnas 'byung mtshan ma 'ba' zhig las //
translated: only the signs of remaining and arising

original: gang gzhan snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gzhan snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will appear, nothing else.

original: de yis de mthong de 'khyims nas //
analyzed: de yis de mthong de 'khyims nas //
translated: He will see that, and he will be caught up in that.

original: de la de ma rangs ltar 'byung //
analyzed: de la de ma rangs ltar 'byung //
translated: He will appear to be displeased with that.

original: de yis de yi rgyun 'gags nas //
analyzed: de yis de yi rgyun 'gags nas //
translated: And that [consciousness] is arrested in its continuum.

original: gang gis gang zin ji bzhin du //🔽zhen pas srid pa de 'dzin byed //
analyzed: gang gis gang zin ji bzhin du // zhen pas srid pa de 'dzin byed //
translated: As it is seized by that,🔽it is held by craving existence.🔽Seized by that mass,

original: gang de de yi gdos kyis bzung //
analyzed: gang de de yi gdos kyis bzung //
translated: it is born in the lower realms.

original: dman 'gro gang de bar bdun pa //
analyzed: dman 'gro gang de bar bdun pa //
translated: The seven intermediate existences

original: gsod la zhen goms de brtsegs pas //
analyzed: gsod la zhen goms de brtsegs pas //
translated: are the accumulation of habituation to attachment to killing.

original: gang gnas gang yin de gnas na //
analyzed: gang gnas gang yin de gnas na //
translated: Wherever it abides,

original: bsad la sogs pa de snang 'gyur //
analyzed: bsad la sogs pa de snang 'gyur //
translated: it appears as killing and so on.

original: gang de de yis mthong ma thag /
analyzed: gang de de yis mthong ma thag /
translated: As soon as it sees that,

original: sngon du goms pas de rig nas //
analyzed: sngon du goms pas de rig nas //
translated: it recognizes it through prior habituation.

original: gsad bya snyam du de rgyug byed //
analyzed: gsad bya snyam du de rgyug byed //
translated: Thinking, “It is to be killed,” it runs toward it.

original: gsad yul skye ba'i gnas mthong nas //
analyzed: gsad yul skye ba'i gnas mthong nas //
translated: Seeing the place where the one to be killed is born,

original: gsad la sogs pa'i las brtsams pas //
analyzed: gsad la sogs pa'i las brtsams pas //
translated: it begins the activity of killing and so on.

original: de dag 'khyims nas zhe sdang 'byung //
analyzed: de dag 'khyims nas zhe sdang 'byung //
translated: Entangled in that, anger arises.🔽That [consciousness] is arrested in its continuum for seven intermediate existences,

original: de yis bar bdun rgyun 'gags nas; ;dman pa'i lus blangs nyon mongs myong //
analyzed: de yis bar bdun rgyun 'gags nas; ;dman pa'i lus blangs nyon mongs myong //
translated: and it experiences the afflictions of taking a lower birth.

original: de ltar gang du 'byung ba yi //
analyzed: de ltar gang du 'byung ba yi //
translated: In that way, wherever it arises,

original: gnas ris rnams kyi bar bdun pa //
analyzed: gnas ris rnams kyi bar bdun pa //
translated: it is the seven intermediate existences of the realms.

original: gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na //
analyzed: gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na //
translated: Wherever it arises,

original: gang zhig goms pa'i yul snang 'gro; ;de la zhe sdang spyod 'khyims bas //
analyzed: gang zhig goms pa'i yul snang 'gro; ;de la zhe sdang spyod 'khyims bas //
translated: The object of habitual perception is the object of anger.

original: snang ba'i dbang gis de rgyun 'gag /
analyzed: snang ba'i dbang gis de rgyun 'gag /
translated: The stream of anger is stopped by the power of perception.
